1,null,null,Maybe They are Wrong About It All We are always told "
2,null,null,when you are depressed , your brain is lying to you about how bad everything is " .
3,null,null,What if they are wrong ?
4,null,null,If someone is piss poor and starving , can not pay their bills , replace their moth - eaten clothes or go out to do interesting things , surely their money situation really IS as bad as all that .
5,null,null,If someone has no family , no friends and has been bullied / abused by everyone they have met in life , perhaps their social situation really IS as bad as all that .
6,null,null,If someone has had lots of physical health issues like cancer , chronic pain , obesity etc , maybe their physical woes really ARE as bad as all that .
7,null,null,Some people go through all of the above , all at once .
8,null,null,So maybe life IS as bad as all that for them .
9,null,null,The whole " your brain is lying about how bad things are " thing often just feels like " you are just imagining your problems " .
10,null,null,Like , I know depression etc , but
11,null,null,make your brain incapable of dealing with them properly
12,null,null,it does not mean legitimate problems do not exist and that some people is lives are not thoroughly worthless all the same .

1,null,null,Yep
2,null,null,- I know this all too well .
3,null,null,And it is a sad state of affairs .
4,null,null,But you are aware of it .
5,null,null,Best you know what is going on than be surprised .
6,null,null,SN , I hear what you are saying about not being able to weather another strike against your stability now .
7,null,null,And I hope you do not have to go .
8,null,null,I will pray with you that you are spared from the cuts this time , but .
9,null,null,while you are praying and hoping , consider the issue of your personal power
10,null,null,If you are feeling shaky in other areas of life , I doubt that you feel that you have any .
11,null,null,I have been in that situation over many things .
12,null,null,Remember the difference between what you DO have control over and what you do NOT have control over : you can control the way you approach this job , your punctuality , your diligence , your politeness to other workers ; you CANNOT control the decisions made on the top and how they will affect your status .
13,null,null,I have been reading a book called " Corporate Confidential " by Cynthia Shapiro .
14,null,null,She was an HR manager for her whole life and .
15,null,null,spills the beans on how companies decide who will stay and who will go
16,null,null,It was an eye - opener for me .
17,null,null,Perhaps it can help you at this juncture .
18,null,null,In your own prayers , remember to ask God not just for the optimal decision to be made on your behalf , but .
19,null,null,for the power to see where you do and do not have control and for help taking charge of the areas that you actually can control
20,null,null,When you are in a phase of instability , it seems that more and more garbage gets thrown your way .
21,null,null,But a turning point comes when the indignation of being tossed on everyone else is sea propels you into action .
22,null,null,That turning point came for me about 9 years ago when a really awful roommate had to be ejected .
23,null,null,I felt a power I had never felt before - the ability to take charge of my own life , not waiting for someone else is decision to tell me whether I was going to be OK or not .
24,null,null,I am trying to find my way back to that point .
25,null,null,I hope you do too .
26,null,null,It can happen .

9,null,null,Dilated Cardio Myopathy caused by a viral infection , left my hearts function at 20%EF .

11,null,null,Ironically , now , I wish they had not discovered it .

1,null,null,I just told all 100 students I teach
2,null,null,I have depression in an email about finals
3,null,null,week I am an undergraduate TA at a university , in an interdisciplinary class about the brain .
4,null,null,I absolutely love being a TA , but admittedly this quarter it has been a struggle mentally , I often feel anxious that I am doing a horrible job .
5,null,null,I sent out this email to all 100 of my students about finals :
6,null,null,Hi everyone , These next two weeks will be a really , really tough time for all of you .
7,null,null,I know how incredibly hard you all have worked this quarter , and how hard you will push yourselves during this final stretch , but there are 2 other things I want you to know : 1 )
8,null,null,I , the other TAs , and our professor will not be disappointed if you do not perform as well you want , so you should not be either .
9,null,null,Tests and grades are not always the best reflection of you as students / scientists , and
10,null,null,they are most certainly are not a reflection of your worth as a person .
11,null,null,All a test assesses is how much content you remember and how well you can take a test at a certain time on a certain day .
12,null,null,It is simply one data point , and
13,null,null,as you should all know by now , 1 data point is not representative of the population .
14,null,null,For many of you , you have other finals / presentations / responsibilities going on , and
15,null,null,it will be difficult to find time to study .
16,null,null,For others , you may want so badly to study a lot , but .
17,null,null,can not because you are so stressed and anxious
18,null,null,I personally deal with anxiety and depression , and
19,null,null,I know how utterly frustrating it is when your mind does not work as well as you want it to
20,null,null,.
21,null,null,2 ) Take care of yourself .
22,null,null,Eat good food , .
23,null,null,get some sleep , spend time with people you love
24,null,null,So , while you prepare for finals these next weeks , keep these two things in mind .
25,null,null,You are all incredibly curious , kind , intelligent and important people .
26,null,null,I brag all the time that I get to work with the most amazing group of students who bring unique and valuable contributions to this class everyday , and .
27,null,null,inspire me to be the best TA I can possibly be
28,null,null,Cheering you on ! !

31,null,null,it honestly feels so liberating to do so .

33,null,null,but I felt like this needed to be said ) .

6,null,null,She would call me frequently just to sing her new hymns
7,null,null,and I would challenge her to learn a new hymn every week
8,null,null,, this routine went on for quite a while between ourselves ..

19,null,null,However , she was recently accepted to a prestigious musical academy , and .

22,null,null,Knowing that the girl went through so much hardship just to chase the dream I stimulated her from her youth gave me so much hope at the darkest point of my life .

24,null,null,Even though I had to wait for 8 years for this news , it was worth it .

1,null,null,Martin Luther King Jr.
2,null,null,And depression "
3,null,null,As my sufferings mounted I soon realized that there were two ways in which I could respond to my situation -- either to react with bitterness or seek to transform the suffering into a creative force .
4,null,null,I decided to follow the latter course"- King JR .
5,null,null,Today got me thinking ..
6,null,null,We need to figure out how we can turn our discontent , anxiety , anhedonia , insecurity , self hatred , and the meaninglessness that we all feel into real world change that we can see , touch , and feel proud of in a tangible form .
7,null,null,We need to figure out as a community , how we can re - direct our negative feelings into helping others , and maby in the process we will be helping ourselves .
8,null,null,I think alot of us feel meaningless , and have a hard time creating motivation to get us out of bed , besides our rare and far between moments of clarity .
9,null,null,If we could find a way to re - direct our negative energy and encourage eachother to work towards causes we believe in , we could change the world while at the same time changing ourselves .
10,null,null,At this point in my life , I have a " good job " and financial security , but
11,null,null,I still experience horrible depression and that underlying feeling that i m a failure and living a " meaninglessness existence " .
12,null,null,I have come to find that the only time I really feel " alive " , or any feeling remotely resembling happiness is when I am either on drugs , or when I am helping people and making a difference .
13,null,null,The latter of those two has actually improved my life , and
14,null,null,I am hoping that as a depression community , we can motivate eachother to help re - direct our sadness to further causes that are meaningful to us , and hopefully squash our cynicism .
15,null,null,"
16,null,null,The LawofConservation of Energy , states thatenergycan neither be created nor destroyed;energycan only be transferred or changed from one form to another "

3,null,null,The last year was by far the worst and the first month of 2018 was even worse .
4,null,null,The last two days I felt extrem dizziness and vertigo
5,null,null,and I wonder if this could be because of my depression and I am also super stressed at the moment .
6,null,null,I have to get stuff done
7,null,null,but I can barly move without feeling the need to puke .
8,null,null,When I lay down it gets even worse .

1,null,null,My Story -
2,null,null,There is hope .
3,null,null,*
4,null,null,*
5,null,null,TRIGGER WARNING - includes graphic language .
6,null,null,*
7,null,null,*
8,null,null,Hi there , first time posting .
9,null,null,I see a lot of posts from high school / college aged people , and
10,null,null,being through that myself
11,null,null,, all I want to do is reach out and hug them and tell them how special they are .
12,null,null,Instead of writing all the typical stuff
13,null,null," you are so young , " " you will grow out of it , " " go see a therapist / take medication , "
14,null,null,etc .
15,null,null,, I thought I would share how depression affected me mentally & amp ; emotionally and .
16,null,null,my journey through college
17,null,null,I got to the point where depression was life threatening , and
18,null,null,I had given up all hope .
19,null,null,I was lucky because my mom ( and my dad ) were 100 % committed to my recovery , even if it meant I deeply hated and resented them at the time .
20,null,null,I realize not everyone has that , but
21,null,null,in sharing my story , I hope that maybe certain aspects can resonate with people going through the same thing I did and help them not feel so alone .
22,null,null,*
23,null,null,*
24,null,null,How Depression
25,null,null,Affected Me**\- trigger warning It finds a way to connect to memories .
26,null,null,To healthy feelings .
27,null,null,And twist them into something dark .
28,null,null,It craves uncertainty and pain and .
29,null,null,tells you that you deserve only that
30,null,null,It makes you seek out the deepest crevices of your mind and get lost .
31,null,null,To the point where you do not even know what is you and what is the sickness anymore .
32,null,null,It almost feels good to indulge because it is so familiar .
33,null,null,We are taught that enduring pain is somehow one of the most beautiful things a person can do .
34,null,null,But what if that pain is not real ?
35,null,null,In college , I was so afraid of being alone that I would not want guys to leave my room .
36,null,null,And there were a fair amount of them .
37,null,null,I would beg them to stay longer and tell them I had separation anxiety .
38,null,null,As long as I was focusing on them , I did not have to focus on me .
39,null,null,I justified it by saying that I was ' enjoying ' my college experience and ' exploring ' my sexuality .
40,null,null,I thought it was normal to not see color , to not ever be excited , to want to drink until my body was as numb as my mind .
41,null,null,I wondered how other people could live life with relative stability and thought I was weak for not knowing what they knew .
42,null,null,To me , it seemed like common knowledge that life was pointless and ultimately a waste of time .
43,null,null,I did not understand why I was the only one that could not cope with that fact .
44,null,null,When I was home over a break , I told my mom that I had accepted I would never be happy .
45,null,null,When my mom said she was hurt by that , it did not even occur to me why .
46,null,null,I thought I had learned the secret that everyone else knew , the secret that let them go to class or work or see friends or make friends .
47,null,null,Even though by the end of my freshman year , I was cutting myself and promiscuous and
48,null,null,drank with the purpose of blacking out
49,null,null,so I could have even just an hour of relief from myself
50,null,null,, I could not admit that I had depression .
51,null,null,I thought I felt and acted like that because I was lazy , stupid , slutty , weak .
52,null,null,Every semester , my grades slipped a little ( or a lot ) at a time , and
53,null,null,my parents grew more and more disappointed in me .
54,null,null,I had been a star student in elementary school , frequently getting the highest scores in class and got into every top middle & amp ; high school .
55,null,null,I felt like such a failure .
56,null,null,At this point , my parents sent me to a very expensive therapist , which ultimately was a waste of money
57,null,null,because all I did was bend the truth to hide every aspect of myself and life .
58,null,null,I do not think I could have even been honest even if I wanted to at this point .
59,null,null,The first semester of my junior year , these thoughts grew too heavy .
60,null,null,I did not want to be there anymore .
61,null,null,I wanted to be nowhere , not awake , not asleep , not alive , not dead .
62,null,null,I spent my time with people that encouraged all my doubts , and
63,null,null,I pushed away people that cared .
64,null,null,I rarely went to class and
65,null,null,even if I did , I scraped by on the assignments .
66,null,null,I lived for the moments of escape when I could go to parties and drink and hook up with guys , no matter how repelled I was by them .
67,null,null,Outside of those few hours of escape , I could not sleep .
68,null,null,I never went to the cafeteria with friends or even to get a real meal .
69,null,null,I only ate Lean Cuisines that my parents had bought me at the beginning of the year .
70,null,null,When I ran out , I ate solely Pizza Rolls and peanut M&amp;Ms .
71,null,null,I did not do laundry once in those few months and .
72,null,null,barely took showers
73,null,null,The only time I put any effort into my personal appearance was when I went to a party because all I wanted was to be perceived as " carefree " and " sexy , " not the lazy slob that I thought I was .
74,null,null,Even then , I wore wildly inappropriate clothing compared to what everyone else at my college wore - one time a girl yelled out to me , " You are going to get raped ! "
75,null,null,Another said judgmentally to a friend , " She is not wearing pants .
76,null,null," ( I was wearing sequined booty shorts , okay ) .
77,null,null,My only happy moments that semester were with a boy that then tried to sexually assault me with a visiting alumnus .
78,null,null,His excuse was that he wanted to get into the alumnus ' frat by impressing that brother .
79,null,null,When he tried to apologize the next morning , I told him he should not apologize .
80,null,null,I was so disconnected from my body , I did not even view it as mine anymore .
81,null,null,After that , I did not blame him and .
82,null,null,still spent most of my ' free ' time with him
83,null,null,( Free meaning when I was not laying on my bed trying to gather enough strength to even leave my room , going to a party or the rare occasion
84,null,null,I went to class or . )
85,null,null,very very rarely attended a sorority event
86,null,null,My last night at that school , my theory that I had borderline personality disorder was weighing on me .
87,null,null,I had been thinking about it for a couple of weeks after I had finally figured out that my behavior and thoughts were not the typical college experience , thanks to my extremely honest roommate & amp ; sorority sister .
88,null,null,She told me that other girls in the sorority thought I was trying to " fuck with their guy friends " and slept with too many people .
89,null,null,I tried to go to the student health center earlier that day .
90,null,null,When I stated , " I think I have borderline personality disorder , " they just said , " What do you want us to do ? "
91,null,null,The only action they were equipped to take was to call the on - duty counselor who had to drive 40 minutes to get to campus .
92,null,null,When I told her about my self harm and drinking and promiscuity
93,null,null,she replied , " How does that make you different than any other student ?
94,null,null," This further cemented my past notion that I was just weak : the numbness and loneliness - the desire to feel anything at all - was normal , and
95,null,null,I just had a huge character flaw by not having the strength to be ' normal . '
96,null,null,That night I got wasted and .
97,null,null,tried to swallow a whole bottle of caffeine pills at my friend
98,null,null,is house
99,null,null,My intention was to induce a heart attack .
100,null,null,He was one of the only people that I knew , but
101,null,null,understood what I was feeling
102,null,null,I never got a chance to tell him how close to the edge I was since his freshman girlfriend and two of her friends were with him that night .
103,null,null,Not that it was his responsibility , but
104,null,null,I just wanted confirmation that something was not right with me .
105,null,null,While I was at his house , I tried to stay true to my ' carefree , ' ' fun ' person that I tried so hard portray while his girlfriend and her friends complimented my shirt and hair .
106,null,null,It made me feel like such a fraud .
107,null,null,Towards the end of the night , after I had swallowed those pills , my friend tried to get me to throw them up and then drove me to my dorm where I could not even find my room .
108,null,null,I stumbled around and .
109,null,null,ran into the RA that had just gotten out of the shower and clung to him
110,null,null,I was scared and confused and .
111,null,null,felt so alone
112,null,null,I eventually got to my room and .
113,null,null,started cutting my already scarred wrist with baby scissors
114,null,null,I tried to cut into my femoral artery with those scissors as well , which was entirely unsuccessful .
115,null,null,I settled for cutting my knee .
116,null,null,At that moment , campus safety knocked on the door .
117,null,null,I kept calm when they asked their usual questions , " Have you been drinking tonight ? , " etc .
118,null,null,, until they asked me to show them my wrists .
119,null,null,That is when I panicked .
120,null,null,Started screaming and crying uncontrollably .
121,null,null,They escorted me to their office .
122,null,null,I later learned one of the officers asked my roommate if I slept around .
123,null,null,While I was incoherently yelling , an officer handed me a phone .
124,null,null,It was my mom , and
125,null,null,I cried that a death of a young man I knew in high school was my fault , and that I could have done something .
126,null,null,( Background :
127,null,null,His death was not my fault in any conceivable way .
128,null,null,He OD'ed .
129,null,null,I barely knew him & amp ; .
130,null,null,did not even know he was an addict , but I had a huge crush on him at the time and never acted on it
131,null,null,Through my warped logic , if I had been braver and talked to him , I could have isaved ' him . )
132,null,null,The next day she was at my school ready to pick me up .
133,null,null,She had flown on the next available flight to get to me .
134,null,null,When I returned home , I went through months of therapy and psychiatry and yoga and meditation .
135,null,null,all arranged all by my mom
136,null,null,In the beginning , I was okay .
137,null,null,Broken down and exhausted but seemingly on the mend .
138,null,null,On some level , I was relieved that I had finally been diagnosed with something ( went from depression to bipolar II to a depressive mood disorder ) .
139,null,null,I worked really hard with my therapist to understand my guilt , disgust and trauma , which ironically had been entirely driven by ways I tried to cope with my depression .
140,null,null,However , fully expecting to go back to college for the next semester , I was informed that I was not allowed to return yet .
141,null,null,When I chose to leave in the middle of the semester , the dean did not share the information that they had never let a student return from health leave until after six months of treatment .
142,null,null,I had withdrawn from all my classes and thinking that I would be returning shortly and only a semester behind .
143,null,null,sacrificed a semester
144,null,null,is worth of my parents money
145,null,null,After that initial blow , my parents eventually gave me more freedom , I met and .
146,null,null,got involved with a guy that got me more into substances
147,null,null,He was going through issues of his own , which is why I connected with him .
148,null,null,One morning , my parents tried to wake me up but .
149,null,null,could not
150,null,null,No need to go into further detail , but
151,null,null,it was one step forward and two steps back ( I no longer wanted to be ' nowhere ' but was now using .. alcohol .. frequently ) .
152,null,null,Despite alcohol being one of my main coping mechanisms , I was fortunate not to develop any dependencies or addictions .
153,null,null,A handful of months later , after my parents had taken away my phone and forced me to be supervised by them every night , I was accepted into a local university .
154,null,null,I had also found a new therapist and psychiatrist .
155,null,null,Their words stuck to me : 1 ) " Depression sucks and it most likely will be with you forever but there are ways of treating it . " and
156,null,null,2 )
157,null,null," You get to a point in your recovery where you can not blame your depression anymore .
158,null,null,You just have to stand up and do your homework
159,null,null,/ go to your job
160,null,null,/ go to class .
161,null,null," I was also lucky enough to have a couple professors that understood on a basic level what I was going through .
162,null,null,One told me to show up to class no matter how miserable I was .
163,null,null,I did not bother to explain that depression was not about being miserable , but
164,null,null,from there on out
165,null,null,I did everything within my emotional power to go to class , .
166,null,null,even if I had drank before ( that happened a couple times ) or did not participate ( happened almost every time )
167,null,null,I ended up getting a C or D in the class , but
168,null,null,I take that as a win since I easily could have failed .
169,null,null,Another professor asked student services to reach out to me after I had not shown up to class a couple weeks in a row .
170,null,null,I learned there will be a lot of people that do not get it and do not want to get it , but .
171,null,null,the one or two that do make all the difference in the world
172,null,null,Throughout my time at the new university , there were a lot of ups ( meeting a close friend and actually making personal connections with people , excelling at the courses in my major ) and downs ( failing multiple classes and having to proactively withdraw due to ispecial circumstances , ' finishing an entire bottle of wine in an hour , crying and writing gibberish about how guilty I felt then inviting some random 30 year old I had met on Tinder over to my dorm room ) , but
173,null,null,slowly I was piecing it together .
174,null,null,I eventually got an on - campus job , then a full time internship then a full - time job .
175,null,null,While I am not perfect these days , I have been at a job I never would have dreamed of for the past two and half years and .
176,null,null,have gotten a promotion
177,null,null,Still , sometimes when the depression gets the best of me , I think that is who I really am .
178,null,null,This broken , beaten down person that is ashamed of basically her entire young adulthood .
179,null,null,I fear that I do not want anything of substance .
180,null,null,That I can not find anything of substance .
181,null,null,That I do not even know what I want .
182,null,null,No path .
183,null,null,No passion .
184,null,null,When it gets that bad , it takes every ounce of strength I have to fight it .
185,null,null,Even on good days , I can feel like it is in the back my mind .
186,null,null,I am terrified that it will come back , and I will not be able to control it .
187,null,null,I will give in to the thoughts that say I am not good enough .
188,null,null,You will never be good enough .
189,null,null,Everything you have dared to want will slip through your fingers , and you will not even know .
190,null,null,All I do is think about how far I have come from that girl who swallowed a dozen caffeine pills .
191,null,null,That girl who thought she would never be happy .
192,null,null,And it gives me just enough strength to deny those feelings and smile .
193,null,null,I hope this was not too personal , but
194,null,null,I wanted to be as raw and honest as possible .
195,null,null,Thanks .

195 45
 (0, 0),
1,null,null,No one has a monopoly on suffering .
2,null,null,We keep living our lives because depression is pain and illness is suffering , but
3,null,null,both do not happen without something happening to us .
4,null,null,It is at these times that we are changing in some way ..
5,null,null,Suffering can give us greater empathy and understanding .
6,null,null,It can strip away all the other stuff .
7,null,null,So many say they will always be depressed ..
8,null,null,that may or
9,null,null,may not be the case
10,null,null,but everyone has right to live their lives .. suffering included .
11,null,null,However , there is a vast difference between simply suffering from depression and finding the courage to live with long term / cyclical depression .
12,null,null,You can , learn to live with depression .
13,null,null,It may profoundly change your life ..
14,null,null,take much away from you , but
15,null,null,you can learn to live with it .
16,null,null,Long term depression is not static .. like any illness , it changes .
17,null,null,But we know depression is different because it so cruelly takes away our hope of a brighter future .
18,null,null,But be stubborn and
19,null,null,it will change again .
20,null,null,To state in a forum like this , that you want to end it all
21,null,null,is a big responsibility to place on the shoulders of other people .
22,null,null,It hands the possibility of that personal choice on to others .. which is unfair .
23,null,null,Genuine suffering can bring more empathy and awareness of the plight of others in similar situations .
24,null,null,There are times when i feel like ending my life and the thoughts nudge at me constantly
25,null,null,but I recognize them now for what they are : the depression talking .
26,null,null,With each episode I have learnt new ways to try and tag these thoughts .
27,null,null,Ultimately .. the illness is happening to me /
28,null,null,the thoughts happen to me .
29,null,null,But I would not burden others with the knowledge of their presence .
30,null,null,It is only afterwards that i might mention that i had these constant thoughts , because to tell them in the middle of the depression .
31,null,null,would only darken their lives as much as the depression is darkening my own
32,null,null,Please think before you make threats of suicide in the chat room or forums .
33,null,null,There is an increasing number of people using this technique of gaining attention but
34,null,null,it is unfair .
35,null,null,by all means we can talk about it .. but .
36,null,null,saying : " i am going to do it
37,null,null," is simply selfish and smacks of attention seeking .
38,null,null,Such behavior is destroying the integrity of genuine sufferers of depression in the eyes of so many .
39,null,null,It is eroding the help which is so lacking for so many ..
40,null,null,and is probably the reason why the mental health hospital near me is a relic from the 60
41,null,null,is
42,null,null,and yet the cancer department is brand new and state of the art .
43,null,null,Please .. stop attention seeking and .
44,null,null,stop using " depression " as a convenient coat hanger for emotional immaturity and lack of personal responsibility
45,null,null,For so many people .. this really is a matter of life and death .

12,null,null,changes forever

21,null,null,not eat much

25,null,null,and I am back in the same city as my girlfriend again and

30,null,null,I tried to answer as truthfully as possible , you have to understand that depression is not something I want to have .
31,null,null,, I have known too many silly teenagers who think that having depression makes them interesting to other people and so they exaggerate emotions to try and look sad to find it appealing
32,null,null,So even though I found myself answering questions that I knew were making me seem depressed
33,null,null,I answered the anyway because it was the truth .
34,null,null,Things like a lowered libido , I find myself wanting to have sex with my girlfriend far far less frequently than I used to and to be honest a lot of the time when I am having sex

37,null,null,and I have found myself thinking about death a lot .

41,null,null,When I feel like this I do not want to be around anyone or have anyone talk to me
42,null,null,and I can not stop myself thinking about bad things that have happened to me or could happen on a personal level and making myself the centre of blame for them .

46,null,null,I have always thought that with problems of that nature you must be told that you are ill and not decide for yourself that you are .

2,null,null,My name is Charlie
3,null,null,and I have suffered from occasional bouts of depression for a while .
4,null,null,Something that has recently taken my interest is the inferiority complex and how this affected my perceptions of things .
5,null,null,I first got onto the idea through a page called Depression Hurts at a Hypnosis site 121 hypnosis ( its worth plugging as I have found it useful ) .
6,null,null,It took a while to admit to myself that I was afraid of not belonging , being criticized
7,null,null,, sarcastic remarks at work etc and it stems back to horrid teachers and kids at school .
8,null,null,This has been a turning point for me though - working through the false learnings and memories , so
9,null,null,I thought I would share it in case it resonates with anyone else .
10,null,null,I have since recognized symptoms of inferiority in others ( and
11,null,null,they vary widely from conceited arrogance to total withdrawal ) , and it is been really great .

1,null,null,Difference between antidepressent starting side - effects and hypomania ?
2,null,null,Hey all , So I have read about how SSRIs can send bipolar people who are misdiagnosed with unipolar depression / anxiety into hypomania or mania .
3,null,null,I have also read that SSRIs can have activating effects during the start up period ( including insomnia , restlessness , distractibility ) that sound similar to some of the symptoms of hypomania .
4,null,null,So if someone starting and SSRI experiences trouble sleeping , restlessness , increased energy , increased distractibility , periods of euphoria , spends money like it is nothing , increased pressure to talk / sing / dance , increased responses to music and caffeine , starting up old hobbies , etc .
5,null,null,, how can they know whether it is a combination of start - up side effects of the SSRI + feeling ( much ) better from the SSRI ( or maybe placebo / excitement from doing something about the depression ) or an antidepressant - induced hypomanic episode ?
6,null,null,I know it is a question for a professional
7,null,null,but I like to hear experiences also .

1,null,null,I am working on a new app / startup to help you guys .
2,null,null,Please read this , I would really appreciate any help / feedback .
3,null,null,Hello everyone !
4,null,null,I am a current sophomore in college studying Computer Science and
5,null,null,this summer I decided to work on a new app that caters
6,null,null,to depressed / suicidal people who are going through bad times .
7,null,null,I want this app to connect depressed users to people who are volunteers at crisis centers or just regular people in general that are willing to devote their time to helping the users .
8,null,null,This app will be similar to twitch where the volunteer will go live ( and
9,null,null,you can see their face ) and any user can instantly connect with them .
10,null,null,First , the user will enter their information like : what their favorite tv shows / movies / music artists are , where they are from , and what type of gender they would feel most comfortable talking to .
11,null,null,All this information gathered will be used to connect the user with a volunteer that closely fits those preferences ( the user can swipe through all of the options that are given to them and they can actually add these volunteers to a list that they would like to come back to ) .
12,null,null,I want it to be a one on one session where the user can decide to turn his / her camera on , or if not , just use the microphone , or if they do not want to do either of those options , they can just use the chat box provided .
13,null,null,I want it to be a social platform where users can connect with other users and see what they are doing .
14,null,null,Basically a user is becoming friends with their streamers / volunteers and other users as well .
15,null,null,Also , these one - on - one sessions can be changed to a room where there can be 4 users to one volunteer and that way more people can connect with each other with like a chaperone .
16,null,null,I would not dare dream of making any money from this app
17,null,null,and I know I need funding from VC is to get this thing skyrocketing .
18,null,null,That is why I am getting all the resources I need from my school is entrepreneurial program
19,null,null,and they are going to connect me to the people I need to know .
20,null,null,I hate to say it
21,null,null,but if I need to make shareholders money , then I will do it , but
22,null,null,I do not want to make a single dime off of an idea that caters to people who are struggling through something so drastic .
23,null,null,This may sound far fetched but
24,null,null,my biggest dream for this app / company , is to have a box filled with goodies being mailed to users when the holidays / Valentine is Day/ birthdays come around that include : letters / voice messages from volunteers saying Happy Birthday !
25,null,null,Or Merry Christmas !
26,null,null,Or Happy Valentine is Day !
27,null,null,followed by more messages that has to do with the user .
28,null,null,This box will also include a lot more goodies that has to specifically do with the user .
29,null,null,I used to be like you guys .
30,null,null,I can not say that I suffered as much as you guys
31,null,null,but I came to this sub a couple of times when I had no one else to go to .
32,null,null,I had no shoulder to cry on in my freshman year of college which is why I think this app could actually mean something to someone .
33,null,null,Please , we need to try and put an end to the huge suicide rate among children / adults in America .
34,null,null,Please provide any feedback , whether good , bad , or helpful .
35,null,null,Anything helps , really .
36,null,null,I can also answer any questions you might have about this app .
37,null,null,Please excuse my bad grammar , I am a computer science major for a reason haha .

4,null,null,It is been really great , and .
5,null,null,has helped pull me from the brink more than once

10,null,null,Spoiler :

12,null,null,If I was not too gay , I was too fat , or too tall , or too weird or too unpopular .

15,null,null,it was not my hair , it was my mannerisms ; if it was not my high voice , it was the dark circles under my eyes .
16,null,null,( Gee , what could have caused me to be losing sleep ? )
17,null,null,Flash forward to today :
18,null,null,My therapist guided me through a meditation today that instructed me to visualize and speak to a younger version of myself .
19,null,null,I described what I looked like , what characteristics defined me , and how I saw myself .
20,null,null,Then I was instructed to , as myself as the adult I have become , speak to that child and tell him what I was feeling .
21,null,null,I spoke with kindness and compassion and love and respect for that child , and .
22,null,null,told him everything would be alright
23,null,null,I told him that all of that hatred was wrong , that it was incorrect and that those people who say all those nasty hurtful things , they probably are not even going to remember saying it ,
24,null,null,so do not waste your time holding onto it .

26,null,null,I have he would onto my life .

28,null,null,side

31,null,null,believed it

35,null,null,, I was not even thinking about all the bullying I did to myself .
36,null,null,*
37,null,null,All this time , * it was me .
38,null,null,*
39,null,null,Sure , it was other people who planted those seeds , but
40,null,null,it was me who perpetuated it , who told myself that they were true .

45,null,null,it is a step in the right direction .

47,null,null,I just wanted to share with you all .

22,null,null,it happened again , severe pain , feeling very uneasy and then boom out of nowhere crippling depression

3,null,null,I have never really posted my story , but
4,null,null,for what it is worth , here it is : I live in northern New York State where I grew up on the family farm .
5,null,null,My brother and I run a feed / hardware / farm supply store .
6,null,null,I have got a terrific wife and two daughters .
7,null,null,ages 1 and 3
8,null,null,My depression hit in January during a bout with the flu ; my youngest daughter was hospitalized with febrile seizures and .
9,null,null,that might be what put me over the edge
10,null,null,My nervous breakdown seemed to come out of the blue , but
11,null,null,I would had an extremely stressful six months between job , illness , and adoption .
12,null,null,I am also a hard driving firstborn perfectionist , and
13,null,null,several family members have had alcoholism or suspected depression .
14,null,null,So I guess depression should not have been so big a surprise , but
15,null,null,it was .
16,null,null,I am a happy person with a great life !
17,null,null,But I feel like I have been right to the edge of the precipice and looked down at Hell .
18,null,null,Now I am doing everything I can to ensure I do not relapse ..
19,null,null,but I actually think I am a better person having been through this .
20,null,null,I am much more appreciative of a ' good day ' and
21,null,null,I am much more attuned to the suffering of others .
22,null,null,It is amazing how many people I know have similar problems .
23,null,null,And I hate that it has to be this way , but
24,null,null,suffering does bring me closer to God .
25,null,null,I hardly dare say that depression and anxiety was ' worth it' ..
26,null,null,the memory of the anguish is still too vivid , and
27,null,null,besides , it could come back tomorrow .
28,null,null,But right now , today , I feel more contented with my crazy , precious , stupid , dear , wasted , amazing life than I have been in years .
29,null,null,I am very lucky to have stumbled onto the right medication the first time , and ' .
30,null,null,to have a supportive family that did not tell me to isnap out of it
31,null,null,And I am very lucky to have the people here in this forum , who know what it is like .
32,null,null,I hope , tvk , that in a few weeks you too will be a recovering depression survivor .
33,null,null,Till then , we are here when you need us !

1,null,null,I often ponder the idea of giving up completely .
2,null,null,Has anyone given up completely ?
3,null,null,How does it feel like ?
4,null,null,I have had extreme depression for 11 years .
5,null,null,For as long as I can remember I have tried so hard to stay alive .
6,null,null,There was a point in my life where I gave up .
7,null,null,I remember my mom was beating me
8,null,null,and I put up my hands to block the belt
9,null,null,and I was crying .
10,null,null,I remember after one of the times she struck me I started to think what
11,null,null,if I gave up ?
12,null,null,And I just shut down .
13,null,null,In that moment I stopped putting my hands up , .
14,null,null,stopped crying , and rolled into a ball while mom kept beating me for a few more minutes
15,null,null,For a few years after that I stopped caring about my appearance .
16,null,null,I got so fat
17,null,null,and I just kept eating and eating .
18,null,null,I stopped caring about my grades and .
19,null,null,did not even try
20,null,null,I would just turn in a blank paper with my name on it .
21,null,null,During high school I woke up and .
22,null,null,started to try again even though it was really hard
23,null,null,Since then I have not stopped .
24,null,null,I regularly do thing I do not want to do in an effort to make it by .
25,null,null,I get up at 5 , I shower every day , I go to the gym
26,null,null,, I do my homework , study , etc .
27,null,null,Currently , I have been working my butt off to be able to join the military to get away from my parents .
28,null,null,My depression is acting up so much , it is getting really hard to keep trying .
29,null,null,I often find myself daydreaming and pondering how good / easy
30,null,null,it would feel /
31,null,null,be to just stop what I am doing and give up .
32,null,null,Get in bed , stay in bed , go eat , eat some more , and more , finally not caring about my appearance and just not doing anything in general .

2,null,null,Now , Mr. Runge had a reputation for being a tough teacher .
3,null,null,He would not let you get away with ANYTHING .
4,null,null,If you fell asleep in his class because you were out all night in some cornfield with a bonfire and a bottle of Jack , he would kick your desk in such a way that your head would fly upward at warp speed and your hangover would instantly get very very bad , and .

10,null,null,make you feel incredibly stupid
11,null,null,and then it will be over . "
12,null,null,TINSTAAFL , pronounced TinStaffel .
13,null,null,There Is No Such Thing As A Free Lunch .

15,null,null,The " free " lunches at college tours were paid for when your parents registered you were charged a " service " fee .

18,null,null,you have to make the purchase

22,null,null,Because now , whenever I take something marketed as free , I know I am paying some sort of overhead or
23,null,null,some poor schmuck is working extra hard so that I can get 2.5 ounces more of my favorite shampoo for the price of the regular size !

1,null,null,Journal Entry - 12:23AM Monday , December 4th , 2017
2,null,null,Just thought I would share my thoughts from last night .
3,null,null,I occasionally lurk Reddit looking for a relatable story , so I figured I would share some of my own thoughts .
4,null,null,I do not want a job .
5,null,null,The hardest part of having a job is talking .
6,null,null,It is bad enough that I have to make eye contact .
7,null,null,Having to speak on top of that can be nerve wrecking .
8,null,null,Meeting new people is also tough .
9,null,null,It is even tougher when you are the new one .
10,null,null,Who are these people ?
11,null,null,Do I even want to know you ?
12,null,null,Are you going to try and get to know me ?
13,null,null,Am I going to allow it ?
14,null,null,Customers are easier to deal with , but .
15,null,null,just a drag to have to deal with
16,null,null,It can be monotonous .
17,null,null,Often , it is annoying .
18,null,null,But all the while , I just feel drained .
19,null,null,There are good days at work .
20,null,null,But there are also bad days .
21,null,null,And those bad days make the lasting impression , in my experience .
22,null,null,I am thankful for those good days .
23,null,null,But the bad days remind me that I want better for myself .
24,null,null,I am tired of working in restaurants .
25,null,null,I am tired of wearing a stupid hat my hair can barely fit under .
26,null,null,I am tired of repeating phrases I am told to repeat .
27,null,null,I am tired of seeing the disgusting process of how people is shitty food is prepared .
28,null,null,I am tired of cooking , something I enjoy , feeling soulless .
29,null,null,Historically , preparing a meal and feeding someone is a virtuous act , at least to me .
30,null,null,The commoditization of it is a bit of a shame .
31,null,null,I detest consumerism , generally speaking .
32,null,null,Customers are not my favorite people .
33,null,null,Along with restaurants , I hope to avoid customer interaction at my next job .
34,null,null,I really do not want any job .
35,null,null,When it comes to time & amp ; energy vs. money , I am all for the money until I find out what I have to do .
36,null,null,Then my my time & amp ; energy feels more valuable .
37,null,null,Because it is more valuable .

1,null,null,NOTES FOR A SUCCESSFUL EFFEXOR WITHDRAWAL
2,null,null,After doing research on this board and others , I prepared the following withdrawal regime and .
3,null,null,carried it out , making slight adjustments as I went along
4,null,null,It worked for me , although the withdrawal was not easy .
5,null,null,I share it with you all in gratitude for all your advice and sharing over these past months .
6,null,null,I hope it will be a help for you preparing to come off Effexor 1 .
7,null,null,MY SITUATION : a. Length of Time of Effexor : 5.5 years b. Dosage : 150 mg XR c. Reason for Effexor : TMJ , myofascia and migraines due to a displaced jaw disc , lock jaw and stress .
8,null,null,d.
9,null,null,Other medications : Flexeril ( periodically over the years but not in past year when things are " bad " ) ; Trazodone , for sleep ; vitamins and herbs as needed .
10,null,null,e. Status : Age : 43 , Height 5'-10 " ; Weight : 160 .
11,null,null,Married , no kids , work from home .
12,null,null,f. Reasons to Come Off :
13,null,null,Generally feeling better with the help of physiotherapist ; life situation has become low - stress and stabile ( secure job , good marriage , work from home ) ; and .
14,null,null,side effects of Effexor becoming irritating , especially the emotional distance from my own thoughts / emotions ;
15,null,null,simply feel that I can not be on this drug for the rest of my life
16,null,null,2 .
17,null,null,MY
18,null,null,WITHDRAWAL REGIME Procedure :
19,null,null,Drop my dosage by 18.75 mg ( XR ) every two weeks .
20,null,null,4 months total time to get to zero .
21,null,null,Divided 37 mg pills into two parts to equal 18.75 , depositing each part in new empty vegetable gel caps ( available at health food store ) .
22,null,null,In general : a. No caffeine -- not even decaffeinated coffee .
23,null,null,b.
24,null,null,No alcohol .
25,null,null,c. Exercise every day ( heartbeat up for 20 minutes or more ) .
26,null,null,d. Steam
27,null,null,Room / Sauna / Hot bath or every day .
28,null,null,long hot shower
29,null,null,e. 40
30,null,null,- 50 hour work weeks
31,null,null,, nights / weekends off for " down time " .
32,null,null,Daily :
33,null,null,a. Vitamins ( one dosage each in the morning and night ) :
34,null,null,B Complex ( 50 mg ) ; C ( 100 mg ) ; E ( 400 iu ) ; Omega ( 200 mg ) ; Glucosamine Sulfate ; 8 glasses of water .
35,null,null,b. Continued with my Trazodone medication for sleep during entire tapering process , .
36,null,null,took no Flexeril
37,null,null,Experience during each tapering of 18.75 mg :
38,null,null,First 24 hours : no side effects .
39,null,null,48 hours : very bad day : grumpy , anger , rage ( for someone relatively sweet natured ) ; nausea , dizzy , balance problems , headache ; when moving head too quickly would become nauseous ;
40,null,null,body pains , disrupted sleep with periodic nightmares .
41,null,null,The main thing is to be as far from other people as possible since any conversation would rub me the wrong way .
42,null,null,Asked wife to take nothing I say personally , agree with whatever I say , or .
43,null,null,simply " get out of my way "
44,null,null,Eventually we found sending her away for the day shopping or whatever to be the best .
45,null,null,On these days I would plan to do a lot of non - thinking busy work around the house : fix things , garden , etc .
46,null,null,Spent extra time at gym and in steam room .
47,null,null,72 hours : very low energy , dopey , foggy ,
48,null,null,wanting to stay in bed , body pains .
49,null,null,My energy would then slowly gain over the next few days .
50,null,null,Some of the above side effects would appear briefly without warning between drops in dosage ( anger , bad nights sleep , sluggish ) .
51,null,null,Once at zero mg .
52,null,null,:
53,null,null,Symptoms : All of the above , but slightly increased in all areas .
54,null,null,Acute allergy symptoms -- sneezing , headache , stuffed up from morning to night -- aches and pains .
55,null,null,I took Benadryl during this time which helped a lot .
56,null,null,Detox Period : Now I had to remove the toxins from Effexor from my body .
57,null,null,Regime :
58,null,null,a. Steam Room / Sauna / Hot bath or twice every day -- with cold shower breaks in between heat sessions to mimic the aspects of fever .
59,null,null,long hot shower
60,null,null,b. cleanser :
61,null,null,Triphila and Psyllium husk powder twice a day c. Dry brush my skin ( the skin holds a 1/3 of the body is toxins )
62,null,null,d. 5 day juice fast , with 2 days before and after of raw vegetables / fruits only .
63,null,null,Stopped all medications , vitamins , benadryl , colon cleanser , everything during this juice fast .
64,null,null,I scheduled the fast approximately 2 weeks after stopping Effexor .
65,null,null,e. Exercise regime every day .
66,null,null,3 .
67,null,null,AM I NOW IN THE CLEAR ?
68,null,null,Here I am 4 weeks after the end of Effexor ( and Trazadone -- which I replaced with melatonin ) .
69,null,null,I continue to take vitamins and .
70,null,null,will do so for quite a while
71,null,null,So .. How am I feeling ?
72,null,null,- I do not have words to describe how wonderful it is to have my feelings , emotions and mind back , where I feel that my moods are my own and not manufactured by Effexor .
73,null,null,- Allergies continue to haunt me daily , but
74,null,null,each day it gets a bit better , and I take less benadryl .
75,null,null,-
76,null,null,No need to remember pill times is wonderful , less dry mouth .
77,null,null,- Still a bit " low energy " , but
78,null,null,it gets better each day .
79,null,null,- Mood is upbeat , feeling hopeful and looking forward to clear windshields everyday !
80,null,null,I hope this help those of you out there planning to come off this drug .
81,null,null,I am grateful for Effexor for all it has done to help me over the years .
82,null,null,I wished they warned me about the withdrawal .
83,null,null,I am grateful for all your suggestions and comments that helped me research and put this regime into place .
84,null,null,It worked for me
85,null,null,and I probably would not change a thing if I were to do it again .

1,null,null,If you do not want periods ( or PMS ) at all there is the 3 monthly injection - Depo - provera - in the UK .
2,null,null,It does not work the same for everyone ( like all medicines ) but
3,null,null,for me it stopped all periods and kept my depression down to such a level that I could function " normally " .
4,null,null,I stopped having the 1 week mood swings , 1 week misery , 1 week mood swings , 1 week ok cycle .
5,null,null,If that is not an option for you there is a herb supplement that I tried called Agnus Castus .
6,null,null,It seems to have beneficial effects for most
7,null,null," women is problems " from aching breasts to full blown menopause .
8,null,null,And it can have the side effect of weight loss ( not a bad thing for me )
9,null,null,I was on it for ten years at a time and !
10,null,null,got to the stage where when I came off it and had a period again I had completely forgotten they were really what like
11,null,null,And things have wings now .
12,null,null,The PMS did not cause my depression
13,null,null,but it certainly did not help it .
14,null,null,Hope this is helpful

479 30
 (0, 0),
1,null,null,I am not able to do breath meditation myself , so
2,null,null,I am a fine one to talk , but I have read that it works .
3,null,null,The thoughts will come , no matter what you do .
4,null,null,Supposedly the trick with breath mediation is that it gives you distance on the thoughts , .
5,null,null,helps you " stand back " from them a bit , and feel the accompanying emotions but not get as carried away by them
6,null,null,This reinforces your ability to know that they are just thoughts , and
7,null,null,they will go away if you do not act on them .
8,null,null,And supposedly either with breath meditation or without , there is an element of " fake it till you make it " at work here .
9,null,null,It is been shown that " acting out anger " as a therapeutic tool actually makes getting angry easier than letting go of it , because it maintains the neurological pathways that anger uses .
10,null,null,One meditation teacher calls it " rehearsing anger " .
11,null,null,So supposedly if you replace negative thoughts / feelings with positive ones , like caring for the part of you that is angry and hurt , then eventually your brain will reprogram itself to think and feel positive things .
12,null,null,Breath meditation has become a non - religious phenomenon in recent years , like yoga .
13,null,null,Three books that are just good reading anyway are " The Art of Happiness " by the psychiatrist Howard Cutler with the Dalai Lama , " Destructive Emotions
14,null,null,- How Can We Overcome Them ? " , by the psychologist Daniel Goleman with the Dalai Lama , and " Anger- Wisdom For Cooling The Flames " , by Thich Nhat Hanh , all of which discuss breath meditation as a simple practice for " mental hygiene " as opposed to a " religious practice " of any sort .
15,null,null,Supposedly the Dalai Lama was really surprised to hear that " self - loathing " is common in Western culture , because it was so uncommon in Tibet-
16,null,null,there was just no concept .
17,null,null,The point of all this is , with or without meditation , is that if you notice a negative thought or emotion when it arises , rather than struggle with it to try to put it out of your mind , you should just quietly label it as " negative thought " and .
18,null,null,let it go away , and/or replace it with a positive thought , like " caring for the wounded child within you "
19,null,null,( It is odd to notice that John Bradshaw , the " king " of " healing the wounded child " , and Thich Nhat Hanh , a Vietnamese Buddhist monk , say the same thing about this . )
20,null,null,But it is being said that there is a great similarity between Cognitive Behavioral Therapy and meditation practice , because meditation practice recognizes negative self - talk and replaces it with positive self - talk , and supposedly conditions the brain to react in positive ways .
21,null,null,In " Destructive Emotions " there is a part about brain imaging that shows that people who meditate are activating more positive parts of their brains .
22,null,null,And again , these books are just good reading anyway .
23,null,null,But like I say , easier said than done .
24,null,null,Supposedly it works for some people .
25,null,null,I can not do it , but
26,null,null,some people can .
27,null,null,Maybe you can .
28,null,null,If nothing else , all these works , including Bradshaw , are good reading and
29,null,null,you may be able to develop positive mental habits and replace the negative mental habits with them .
30,null,null,Both breath meditation and Cognitive Behavioral Therapy have been shown to be good adjuncts to recovery from depression , even if the depression itself is being treated with medication .

1,null,null,How much longer can I fake it ?
2,null,null,I am 33 , .
3,null,null,had a full - time job for several years and have a young son
4,null,null,I took a leave from work in 2014 for mental illness , at which point I was diagnosed with depression and anxiety disorder , prescribed Zoloft and was back at work when my short term disability ran out .
5,null,null,This was the first time I would been on anti - depressants .
6,null,null,I felt tired all the time , had no sex drive , and , but
7,null,null,started gaining weight
8,null,null,at least I was functional .
9,null,null,Over the next year , I received a few verbal warnings and 1 written warning at work about my poor performance .
10,null,null,Eventually , the mask broke and
11,null,null,I was on leave again in 2015 .
12,null,null,This time I was away for much longer , was diagnosed w/ dysthymia , tried several different medications , found out that just about every SSRI gave me horrible side effects ( sweating , nausea , insomnia , no sex drive , I am actually thinking now that maybe they caused serotonin syndrome ) and eventually landed on Remeron and Wellbutrin .
13,null,null,This combo actually started to work , without any side effects ( except for weight gain , which I have been managing with a diet now ) .
14,null,null,This time , I returned to work because I received notice in the mail that my employment was going to be terminated because it was coming up on 2 years without being at work .
15,null,null,I figured if I was going to be fired for not returning .
16,null,null,, I may as well return
17,null,null,, make some money and worst thing that happens is I get fired anyways
18,null,null,I was not better when I returned to work , I was functional , I was able to smile , but .
19,null,null,the low mood persisted in a big way
20,null,null,And so here I am , still working , trying to fake it everyday , feeling like a house of cards that s ready to topple .
21,null,null,I am afraid because if I go off work again that will have been 3 leaves of absence , and I really do not think I could show my face around here anymore after that .
22,null,null,I remember how horrible my life felt when I was on medical leave .
23,null,null,I remember falling behind on child support , having to borrow money from my parents .
24,null,null,I remember trying to convince my girlfriend that my low sex drive was because of meds and not because of her .
25,null,null,I remember trying to convince an insurance company that I am sick , while simultaneously trying to convince myself that I can get better .
26,null,null,I remember feeling like a useless waste of skin that drained on the resources of everyone that dared to care about me .
27,null,null,I guess what I am saying is I know , right now , I am suffering from depression , and I am afraid of what might happen if I admit that again .

1,null,null,Depressed people get sick , too ; How stigma in the medical community made me sicker I have often found myself in a chicken and egg situation with my doctors when it comes to depression .
2,null,null,When I say I am sick , they are too quick to assume the depression is the cause of my pain and not the other way around .
3,null,null,After five minutes listening to me breathe , looking into my throat , and and touching the outside of my neck , they are stumped so it must be mental illness .
4,null,null,It got the the point that when I was having severe abdominal pain , I did not go to the hospital .
5,null,null,I had to push for any kind of testing , which took forever .
6,null,null,When I finally found a doctor who listened to me , she told me I should have gone to the ER .
7,null,null,Then I was depressed about that ; I had let the other doctors make me doubt my own sanity .
8,null,null,Turns out , I have been pretty sick and needed surgery .
9,null,null,Nearly all of the issues they blamed on depression were due to a chronic , painful illness with no cure .
10,null,null,It is bittersweet , I have solved a big piece of the puzzle for sure .
11,null,null,But I am still struggling a lot .
12,null,null,I just found out that I may be infertile .
13,null,null,After my doctor said having a baby could help my condition .
14,null,null,So that was depressing too .
15,null,null,( I do not think my depression caused my infertility .
16,null,null,Checkmate , doctors ! )
17,null,null,I did start seeing a psychiatrist , and
18,null,null,he is a kind man .
19,null,null,He diagnosed me with depression and anxiety .
20,null,null,He has never suggested that my depression is the cause of my physical problems , and
21,null,null,he seems to be sympathetic to me as a chronic pain patient .
22,null,null,He is given me depression medication , but
23,null,null,I do not know how much it is helping .
24,null,null,Chronic illness is a thing that happens to people and
25,null,null,it is just * depressing
26,null,null,* .
27,null,null,I have always had depression , but
28,null,null,this just makes it worse .
29,null,null,He has never dismissed me for feeling that way or written off my pain as being in my head .
30,null,null,Just wanted to share my experience with others who might understand .
31,null,null,People with depression can experience health issues and .
32,null,null,get dismissed so easily
33,null,null,It took me years and years to get anywhere .
34,null,null,It is a struggle to cope with both mental and physical illness .
35,null,null,Here is to getting through today , friends .

10,null,null,after I told the doctor what I will tell you now , about 2 months ago , he " upgraded " my status to severe depression , hence the increase in dosage .

13,null,null,nevertheless I can not help but feel my symptoms might be the result of an even more serious problem .

15,null,null,my physical health is deteriorating to the point where that is the main factor preventing me from accomplishing day to day tasks .
16,null,null,My symptoms are as follows ( and they may be generalized , I will admit ) :
17,null,null,Constant fatigue , even after plenty of rest ; constant aching throughout the body ; generally feeling very weak , lacking energy and strength , e.g. carrying shopping home can leave my arms in agony ; loss of coordination , I have become very clumsy , always knocking glasses over , or dropping things for no reason ; occasional loss of balance , usually when getting up , or starting to walk from a stand still ; joints are feeling slightly stiff , they still move , but
18,null,null,I can feel more resistance than normal and they get very tired very quick if was to use them , or even just hold my arms straight out in front of me ; and for me , the worst symptom is an almost constant tremor in both hands and arms , which sometimes spreads throughout the body .

20,null,null,results in jerky movements

22,null,null,after all exercises , even low intensity ones , the trembling seems to intensify .

2,null,null,but I need to get this off my chest in a place where people will understand me .
3,null,null,Dear people that think happiness is a choice , it is not .
4,null,null,Me or my fellow sufferers do not choose to be miserable .
5,null,null,In fact if it really was that simple , I am sure 99 % of us would choose to be happy without even having to think .
6,null,null,I feel sad because I have mental illness .
7,null,null,If you do not know , that means my brain is not normal .
8,null,null,My brain has deficiencies and such that keep me from feeling happy , even when I should .
9,null,null,I am so sick of reading replies to mine and other people
10,null,null,is post about depression that try to oversimplify a serious mental illness that can cause suicide .
11,null,null,I swear everyone on this website assumes we do nothing to try to help ourselves .
12,null,null,I really can not believe people are that misinformed that they really think that many people choose to be that miserable .
13,null,null,You would not choose to be miserable if you had the choice , and
14,null,null,so would we .

16,null,null,Then we have comments like " Just put a life together that wo nt make you depressed " .
17,null,null,I think these piss me off the most .
18,null,null,If it was really that simple you think I would of done that by now ?

21,null,null,Stop oversimplifying a serious illness

5,null,null,thought better of it

8,null,null,I am embarrassed that I have sought out people in my life for emotional support when I should have dealt with things privately , on my own .
9,null,null,When I lost my mind to grief , I forgot everything that I knew .
10,null,null,As the old adage goes : you come into this world alone , you live alone , you die alone .
11,null,null,You solve your problems alone .
12,null,null,, needs to be added
13,null,null,The intense pain of grief can warp your mind , .
14,null,null,impair your judgment and make you do foolish things that you will later regret
15,null,null,I am sorry if I have upset anyone , but
16,null,null,my intention was simply an attempt at self - help , not to change the world .
17,null,null,I was simply searching for a way to try to deal with and escape from this pain .

19,null,null,and I thought I had expressed that before .

21,null,null,would even really want me to contact them

27,null,null,, troubled me back down into a box for a little while

5,null,null,stayed high for 8 years

1,null,null,Hi folks , I have only discovered this topic after making several previous posts I am from a traditional Asian culture , but .
2,null,null,now half - westernized on migration to Australia since age 6
3,null,null,I have had a long history that stems right to my parents ' histories before I was born .
4,null,null,To cut it very short , my father has schizoid / schizotypal / socially withdrawn personality traits , and my mother has dependent traits , so they basically had a loveless marriage ( common in my culture ) .
5,null,null,There is a long history of parental quarrelling and physical abuse on my mother before and after I was born , some of which I heard as a child to early teens .
6,null,null,I was seldom exposed socially growing up , and
7,null,null,I had few school friends .
8,null,null,I was also ' born ' a quiet person , but this and lack of socializing made me a withdrawn kid .
9,null,null,When I was about 4 , I believe I experienced one psychotic episode ( I isaw ' 2 caped ' grim reapers ' at that time ) , since which I have no further experiences .
10,null,null,I experienced a few bouts of depression during secondary school , for which I did not seek help because of my shyness and parental / cultural stigma that wouldepression does not exist ' ( .
11,null,null,thankfully my family has ditched that attitude now )
12,null,null,During that time , I had many suicidal thoughts and maybe 3 times but .
13,null,null,attempted suicide
14,null,null,did not tell anyone about it
15,null,null,A very terrible incident also happened towards the end of high school - one night , I physically assaulted my father while he was quarrelling with mom , and
16,null,null,he was hospitalized .
17,null,null,I got charged with assault , but
18,null,null,no conviction was recorded after I did psychotherapy for anger control
19,null,null,- that was also the only therapeutic contact with psychological / psychiatric services I had until very recently .
20,null,null,That incident , although I felt numb through that time , has been scarred into my memory - I can still recall the events , and
21,null,null,my conscience is still wrecked over it , though I continue to fight it and let it go .
22,null,null,At school , I was a top - end academic achiever in science and math .
23,null,null,I was named dux of the school on graduation .
24,null,null,Upon entering university , my depression became worse mainly because of increased social isolation .
25,null,null,I was still shy and withdrawn
26,null,null,, I lost contact with my high school friends ( they also saw me as ' weird ' , but
27,null,null,I was also a bit narcissistic towards them at some times -
28,null,null,I think it was an unconscious aggressive reaction towards them ) , and .
29,null,null,failed to make any lasting friendship with university peers
30,null,null,One year into university , I started studying Medicine , which I am still doing at the moment .
31,null,null,However I felt that course had over time did not improve me , though I did make few friends .
32,null,null,I still felt unable to socialize with peers , even though I was in constant contact with them through many lectures and tutorials .
33,null,null,Even though I was an average performer , I felt I struggled heavily through the years with study .
34,null,null,Late last year , my depression hit a new low -
35,null,null,my parents had another quarrel , and
36,null,null,I was studying psychiatry which forced me to realize the extensiveness of my past and current problems .
37,null,null,It was another awful time - I lost a lot of self - confidence / esteem , .
38,null,null,became more withdrawn
39,null,null,I ended up failing my first practical exam but still passed given my past satisfactory academic record - the faculty put it down to lack of practice , but
40,null,null,the truth is because of what I experienced leading up to the exam .
41,null,null,In this year however my depressive bouts became much worse - my few friends had deferred , and
42,null,null,I was left with no friends , despite still knowing the others ' by name ' .
43,null,null,My experience during this year was largely negative - I felt harassed by teaching doctors , peers , being looked at as a ' weirdo ' and
44,null,null,excluded from conversations and their social outings
45,null,null,( whether this was a valid view , I am finding out now by resocializing with them -
46,null,null,my main aim at the moment ) .
47,null,null,Over the last 2 months I had about 5 more depressive episodes , and
48,null,null,attempted suicide 3 times
49,null,null,, again nobody knew about them .
50,null,null,It became a frantic situation - I approached the faculty dean for help , but
51,null,null,he only recommended me a psychiatrist , he was supposed who to contact before I contacted him .
52,null,null,However that psychiatrist was not notified , and
53,null,null,I felt very angry about it and thought that nobody was out there to help me .
54,null,null,In retrospect , my view was unrealistic - help only exists on a professional level , something I knew long before but did not acknowledge at that time , making me upset .
55,null,null,My depression faded away a few days later .
56,null,null,A few nights ago , I had a short dispute with mom , .
57,null,null,got upset and this eventually led to me joining this forum after a quick search on the net
58,null,null,Why am I writing this intro ?
59,null,null,Several reasons .
60,null,null,I want to tell my story to others , and feel this is a stepping stone to encourage myself .
61,null,null,I also want others not yet aware that depression can affect ANYONE , even the best of us , even those involved in the medical profession ( up to 30 % of junior doctors suffer from depression , and up to 10 % have attempted / committed suicide ) .
62,null,null,I want to improve my own situation - most of all , learning to deal with feelings of sadness and negatively that has crippled me mentally in the past , and
63,null,null,my lack of sociability which does not help my situation .
64,null,null,I know deep inside I am capable of pulling through , of being able to live a normal healthy life because I am aware of my problems and have the power to deal with them .
65,null,null,Finally , although I am still a student , I believe my position is privileged and that I should use what knowledge I have learnt to help others as best as I can , something I will be bound to by Hippocratic Oath on finishing school .
66,null,null,I am grateful that such a forum exists for others and me to express our thoughts , experiences and feelings , and that there are people out there who devote themselves for such causes .
67,null,null,Thank you all .

2,null,null,It was very painful to discuss
3,null,null,but I think it is a step in the right direction .
4,null,null,Up to now , I have never discussed my depression with anyone besides my husband and my therapist .
5,null,null,I have slight PTSD from when I was kid and a teacher had been " concerned " for me by some disturbing behavior .
6,null,null,I felt even more misunderstood and .
7,null,null,felt so much anguish that I became really good at disguising my depression
8,null,null,I hid it under a fake , likable , version of myself because I wanted to fit in and feel like I belong .
9,null,null,Currently , my closest friends are my coworkers but they the most judgmental people I have known .
10,null,null,We became close by commiserating together at work .
11,null,null,Fast forward a few years , I am finally starting to feel better after seeking help for my depression .
12,null,null,I have been seeing a therapist for over a year , .
13,null,null,began taking antidepressants two months ago , and have been taking cognitive behavioral therapy sessions
14,null,null,As I begin to feel better , I also feel more miserable hanging out with my friends .
15,null,null,I decided to be more open with the people around me about my depression .
16,null,null,I revealed it today for the first time with one of my closest friends .
17,null,null,It was incredibly scary for me ..
18,null,null,I have not felt this vulnerable in a long time .
19,null,null,My friends typically see me as a guarded person with a hard exterior , but
20,null,null,I felt tears welling in my eyes .

22,null,null,I am not the first person he knows with depression
23,null,null,so it was reassuring to know he did not think I was some sort of freak .
24,null,null,He also commended me for taking steps in getting better and .
25,null,null,encouraged me to continue talking about it
26,null,null,It was a positive experience overall .
27,null,null,I then decided to tell another friend later in the day because I was feeling good after the discussion I had earlier .

30,null,null,which instantly flooded my mind with negative feelings of remorse .

33,null,null,* feel * depressed .
34,null,null,It is a mental condition I have which causes me to be in a persistent state of sadness and worthlessness .
35,null,null,He asked me if I understand where Eric is coming from ( his bipolar nephew that he sometimes mentions ) , and
36,null,null,I said yes .
37,null,null,He then seemed to become more curious and .
38,null,null,asked me many questions about it is what like
39,null,null,In the end , I feel like I educated him on depression and hopefully helped debunk his belief that depression is just a feeling that people should be able to snap out of .

41,null,null,I was even a month ago .

43,null,null,I do not know what kept me composed today , but
44,null,null,I am so proud of myself for making it through the conversation without snapping or becoming defensive .

1,null,null,Feeling Good is an excellent book .
2,null,null,I have re - read a few times when I have felt the need .
3,null,null,If you are looking at something for anxiety and panic , I suggest Mastering Anxiety and Panic revision II
4,null,null,( map-3 ) by David Barlow
5,null,null,.
6,null,null,I suffered from anxiety , panic attacks and agoraphobia from the time I was 12 until last year ..
7,null,null,that is 30 years .
8,null,null,Nothing had ever helped until I found a therapist that uses that program .
9,null,null,A different way of looking at things
10,null,null,and I have to say that I worked miracles for me .
11,null,null,I am driving , flying , going to concerts , sporting events ..
12,null,null,things I have not done for over 20 years .

6,null,null,last year , just 4 days after my 19th birthday , I was diagnosed with Persistent Depressive Disorder .
7,null,null,This disorder is characterized by long lasting , essentially uninterrupted periods of depression lasting AT LEAST 2 years , and
8,null,null,in many cases , such as with myself , far longer .
9,null,null,To provide a rough estimate , I have been depressed somewhere around a total of 13 years of my life .

21,null,null,so I feel a great sense of accomplishment .
22,null,null,This has really helped boost my self esteem and confidence , even though I was rejected .

1,null,null,Struggled with depression and anxiety for 3 years and made it through Hi everyone , I just wanted to share my experiences with depression and anxiety in the hope it might give someone else a reason to keep going .
2,null,null,I am new to reddit , so I hope this is okay !
3,null,null,I have struggled with severe depression and anxiety for the past three years and
4,null,null,it is honestly been the most difficult thing I have ever dealt with .
5,null,null,Mental illness is silently crippling .
6,null,null,I have spent more nights than I can remember wracked with sobs , feeling incredibly alone , and fantasizing about suicide .
7,null,null,I have spent more days than I can remember feeling hollow , being apathetic , and not caring about what happened to me .
8,null,null,Depression is a fucking bitch , and
9,null,null,even now , when I actually feel happy and loved and excited for my future , I am not naive enough to think that I will never have to struggle with my mental health again .
10,null,null,But I think I have learned how to best cope with it .
11,null,null,Medication did not work for me , and
12,null,null,while I do believe that professional therapy can be invaluable to people struggling with mental illness , it did not make a big difference in my case .
13,null,null,But I learned to focus on the present , to rely on loved ones I am lucky enough to have , and to forgive myself .
14,null,null,Take it one small step at a time .
15,null,null,So what if you could not leave your room today ?
16,null,null,That shit is fucking hard !
17,null,null,You got up and
18,null,null,you got out of bed
19,null,null,, that is the first step .
20,null,null,Learn to love yourself even through the despair and self - loathing .
21,null,null,There is no one path to overcoming depression , and
22,null,null,sometimes it is not exactly the cure - all you envisioned but rather learning to live with it .
23,null,null,But I promise you all that one day , it will be better .
24,null,null,You will be happy again .
25,null,null,And until then , I am happy to listen to you if you ever need anyone to talk to or have any questions .
