2,null,null,My name is Jenna .
3,null,null,I am 20 years old and .
4,null,null,just joined and figured that I should introduce myself
5,null,null,I found this site from searching online and .
6,null,null,think that it is great
7,null,null,I only started accepting the fact that I have been depressed last year because I have always been very good at hiding it from everyone else and I used to fool myself as well ( if that makes sense ) .
8,null,null,I have never been one to seek help from others because in the past I have always dealt with everything myself .
9,null,null,The start of college and being outside ( different state ) of my home environment ( which is the cause of a lot of anger and resentment that I also have ) helped me to see that there was something wrong with the way that I was living and that I could reach out and get help .

838 45
 (0, 0),
1,null,null,I checked myself in to a Mental Hospital I decided after dealing with months of annoying suicidal ideation that I should go to a mental hospital .
2,null,null,I say annoying because I was aware of these increased thoughts and wanted nothing to do with killing myself .
3,null,null,While I wanted a closed environment away from home stressors to solve my issues I was also afraid of going somewhere unknown .
4,null,null,I went through with it ( despite crying and feeling emotional on the way there ) to get my life turned around .
5,null,null,I feel very often that horror stories are told of hospitals .
6,null,null,In reality , if you need the help , please seek it out .
7,null,null,You may have a completely different experience than someone who claims they do not remember their stay and was drugged up to their eyeballs .
8,null,null,My experience was a pleasant one overall .
9,null,null,I went there and
10,null,null,focused on fixing my issues
11,null,null,and I would say I came out feeling better .
12,null,null,I am not sure if I can or should give the name of the place
13,null,null,but I am sure someone can let me know down below .
14,null,null,I just want to share my experience and help people not feel so afraid of going to one .
15,null,null,The place was pretty clean .
16,null,null,An adult area for people 18 and over , rooms and halls split by gender .
17,null,null,Bathrooms only seemed a bit off towards the end of the day or during the morning when people would shower .
18,null,null,Roommates were sweet and tidy thankfully but
19,null,null,the option to change roommates if there was a problem was always available to me .
20,null,null,Groups were informative and engaging as well as encouraging for others to speak up if they wished .
21,null,null,You had a good amount of personal time to do whatever .
22,null,null,Outdoor activities were available permitting the weather .
23,null,null,The place was meant for short stays of up to a week so anyone who is still there for longer may see the groups as too repetitive .
24,null,null,The food was surprisingly delicious and great .
25,null,null,Honestly expected school lunch type of food
26,null,null,but there was variety and options for those allergic , vegetarian or needing gluten free food .
27,null,null,There were staff members around whenever you needed them for anything .
28,null,null,The treatment team could have been better .
29,null,null,They were good to me but not to everyone there .
30,null,null,Changed meds without informing me .
31,null,null,I went from 5 to 10 to 15 mg of Abilify .
32,null,null,Good Lord I felt it once I was home .
33,null,null,Then REALLY felt it when they made a mistake
34,null,null,and I went cold turkey for two weeks because I could not get my prescription filled .
35,null,null,I will update once I am properly back on it .
36,null,null,So that is my experience .
37,null,null,After a week , I came out feeling better .
38,null,null,I got off of Wellbutrin after determining it could be the cause of my increased depression .
39,null,null,The Abilify gives me energy to get up and not be stuck in bed all day .
40,null,null,I feel better than when I went in .
41,null,null,I know this is a long post , however I have been afraid of sharing my experience with others .
42,null,null,I do not want to feel afraid of ashamed of having went ,
43,null,null,so here I am with this post .
44,null,null,If this is also posted in the wrong place , please let me know
45,null,null,and I will gladly move it to the right subreddit .

 (0, 0),
1,null,null,What Depression is Like For Me .
2,null,null,Having depression is like sailing with a hole inside your boat and only a bucket to keep you afloat .
3,null,null,Depression is wanting to have friends but are too anxious to go out and stay a while longer .
4,null,null,Depression is forcing yourself out of bed , not for yourself but those who count on you .
5,null,null,Depression is having an empty feeling inside your chest while your head is crowded with self loathing .
6,null,null,Depression is where people tell you " it will all get better " but only hearing the silent whispers of the wind .
7,null,null,Depression is where you slowly lose your personality , joy , and interest for those things that you have used to love .
8,null,null,Depression is where a stranger tells you " I will be here for you " and you take it as an insult .
9,null,null,Depression is where you hurt , crawl on the floor crying , grabbing on to dear life alone in your dark room with your thoughts , too tired to do anything and then go to bed only to rise again to pretend that nothing happened .
10,null,null,To pretend , nothing happened .

1,null,null,Depressed ?
2,null,null,Or Just in a Bad Rut ?
3,null,null,( Long Post )
4,null,null,I have never really felt like I have had depression before .
5,null,null,I am turning 24 at the end of the week , and
6,null,null,this is the first time I have honestly wondered about myself .
7,null,null,Usually , I am pretty happy about things , and
8,null,null,my outlook on life has always been realistically positive .
9,null,null,But , lately , I just feel absolutely lost .
10,null,null,And this morning , after I got off of work , I sat and .
11,null,null,cried
12,null,null,I am not much of crier at all , and .
13,null,null,the only other time I have cried in the last ten years has been at an uncle
14,null,null,is funeral recently
15,null,null,This past summer , for me , was a pretty great time .
16,null,null,I was in a relationship with a girl who really made me happy , more than any other one had before .
17,null,null,I seemed to be having fun every weekend , whether with her or with some friends of mine or family .
18,null,null,I had a lot on the horizon , and .
19,null,null,a lot to look forward to
20,null,null,I was getting ready to finish up my degree , and
21,null,null,it seemed like things were going in the right direction .
22,null,null,The only thing that was a problem then was that my job was a third shift job , but
23,null,null,it was 3 days a week , and usually 11 - 13 hour shifts , meaning I had time to do stuff outside of it .
24,null,null,But , my then girlfriend and another friend had solid connections that they thought could help me land a much better job where they worked , which would carry me pretty well until I finished school .
25,null,null,Things were looking up for me .
26,null,null,I was pretty happy .
27,null,null,I guess things started to slip for me when my uncle got hit with a terminal diagnosis in August .
28,null,null,At 47 , and with young children , nobody in the family was prepared to lose him .
29,null,null,And the disease , an incredibly rare degenerative brain disease , was the same one that killed my grandmother 11 years ago .
30,null,null,We lost him in early September .
31,null,null,The thing with this disease that nobody in the family is talking about is that , if it hits twice within the same bloodline , there is a 50 % chance that living relatives within the bloodline will get it in their 40
32,null,null,is or .
33,null,null,50 is
34,null,null,There is nine of us left in the immediate family , including my mother , my brother and myself .
35,null,null,And since it is so rare , there is absolutely no treatment plan .
36,null,null,That , for me , was a lot to process .
37,null,null,I am not worried about myself , but
38,null,null,the idea that I could still be losing relatives to this disease for years sucks .
39,null,null,It is hard enough seeing it happen twice .
40,null,null,During this time , things started to fall apart with me and my then - girlfriend as well .
41,null,null,I kind of hid out with her for a while , because my family was perpetually sad and in a state of distress .
42,null,null,And since I worked nights , I was kind of isolated .
43,null,null,Things started to hit a rut between me and her when she started her own treatment for depression .
44,null,null,I tried to be supportive of her , while doing whatever anyone in my family needed while my uncle was sick .
45,null,null,She really seemed happy that I was there for her , ( and
46,null,null,things really worked out since she lived so close to my uncle anyways , and I could bounce back and forth from place to place on my days off . )
47,null,null,Both my family and my girlfriend were very important to me , and
48,null,null,I guess helping them out made me feel good about myself , even though the situation was shitty .
49,null,null,I kind of let school fall to the back - burner though .
50,null,null,And I kind of neglected my other friends for a while as well .
51,null,null,But between work , my family , and her , I was consistently busy .
52,null,null,My uncle passed in early September , sending most of my family into a pretty bad state , and only a week later
53,null,null,, my girlfriend decided she was done with me , because she was afraid that if she recovered from her depression with me around , then she would equate me with happiness , and if I left her then she would not be able to recover .
54,null,null,( Which ended up being mostly a made up way of saying , I do not love you anymore , but
55,null,null,I do not have the courage to tell you . )
56,null,null,Obviously , it was not fair to her to be stuck with me if she was not happy with me , but
57,null,null,there were so many better opportunities for her to break things off , and she chose the one that was the most tedious and mentally draining for me .
58,null,null,My state of mind after it ended was not great at all , and
59,null,null,I said some very mean things to her after it ended , ( I guess , at the time , I thought it was constructive criticism , but it was all just mean and awful and embarrassing . )
60,null,null,Understandably , she has not talked to me since , and
61,null,null,I feel like I burned any bridge towards reconciling with her .
62,null,null,I missed my uncle a lot , but
63,null,null,doing favors for his wife and kids helped me at least feel like I was contributing .
64,null,null,My mother is still kind of a mess about it , but
65,null,null,she has my father for support .
66,null,null,My brother had a hard time for a while too , but
67,null,null,his job keeps him well occupied .
68,null,null,But , lately , for me , the things I can help with anymore have been fewer and fewer .
69,null,null,Right now , I just want to fast forward to like March or April .
70,null,null,I do not want to deal with my birthday ,
71,null,null,since the plans I had with my ex - girlfriend are obviously not happening anymore , most of my friends are busy with work and school , and my family is still not back to being normal .
72,null,null,Nobody seems to want to do much for my birthday anyways , which is , for lack of a better word , normal for me .
73,null,null,When I got home from work this morning , I cried thinking about it all .
74,null,null,I have never had that kind of emotional reaction to anything before .
75,null,null,The only thing I look forward to in life at the moment is my night or two out with a friend a week .
76,null,null,The holidays are going to be rough on my family , I know now that my ex girlfriend ( who I still care for and would probably take back ) has completely moved on from me , and the once promising prospect of a new job is not nearly as likely as it used to be .

78,null,null,I am not I wanted where to be with that , either .

80,null,null,right now I am just dreading the next month .

83,null,null,a sign that I have a more serious problem .

85,null,null,it is been tough .

87,null,null,it does not help much .

1,null,null,I want to share my experience moving to NYC from Israel - four months ago
2,null,null,Hello everyone , I just thought it would do good for me to share my experience moving to this city among other new yorkers and maybe hearing some new voices of people who are living here and know better than me or even went through the same thing .
3,null,null,So basically , I am 28 years old and .
4,null,null,moved to NYC four months ago with my wife
5,null,null,My wife is doing her Ph.D. at Columbia University , and
6,null,null,I just joined her ( with a work permit during our stay here ) , and we are going to be here for at least 3.5 years , but we could choose to stay for five years if we wish to .
7,null,null,( At the moment I do not see it happening )
8,null,null,I have to say that moving here has been the most difficult challenge I have ever been through in my life .
9,null,null,First , though my English is not bad at all , I am SO , SO insecure about it .
10,null,null,I am feeling afraid to open my mouth and say complicated things , and
11,null,null,it is depressing me .
12,null,null,( I am a person who is talking a lot by nature .
13,null,null,I have always been like that )
14,null,null,And I feel like someone took away that ability from me
15,null,null,and I am much less charismatic in English than in Hebrew which affects my confidence tremendously ..
16,null,null,After smoking weed for 4 - 5 years almost every day in Israel , I quit doing it since the first month I got here only because it made me feel very anxious
17,null,null,( it used to make me feel quite the opposite before )
18,null,null,I used to be a teacher in Israel and pretty quickly I have found a job as a teacher that teaches Hebrew here in New York .
19,null,null,( In Israel I used to teach History which I found much more interesting than teaching a language , but
20,null,null,that is what I got here , so I have to live with that )
21,null,null,A few days ago , I had a conversation with my boss , and
22,null,null,apparently , they are pleased by my work there , and they asked me if I am willing to continue for next year which is nice to hear even though I do not like this job that much .
23,null,null,I guess I will have to compromise .
24,null,null,My wife and I are supported by an excellent scholarship , and we do not have to worry a lot about money or health insurance so , on the financial field , we are kinda covered .
25,null,null,But being here makes me feel powerless .
26,null,null,Obviously , I do not have my good friends here with me , and
27,null,null,I feel much less " special " as a person .
28,null,null,I feel like I am only one among millions who are trying to survive in this big hectic city .
29,null,null,In the beginning , I thought it is beautiful that this city is full of people from all around the world , but
30,null,null,now it just feels to me that everyone are strangers to each other
31,null,null,and it seems like it is the loneliest city in the world at the moment .
32,null,null,And because I do not have friends here and I am married ( so meeting with girls on tinder etc .
33,null,null,is not an option )

3,null,null,I could vent to reddit without worrying that any of my family or friends will read this .

5,null,null,It consumes your mind almost every second of every day .
6,null,null,I am usually a positive person ( at least I try to be ) .

28,null,null,Now , days , even weeks would pass without her crossing my mind .

1,null,null,Well , I have to admit that as a male I have always viewed my own depression as personal weakness .
2,null,null,I still do , I can not help it ..
3,null,null,it is a notion , feeling or philosophy or whatever that is been instilled from an early age .
4,null,null,I know this is not a popular or realistic way to feel about depression .
5,null,null,I mean , it is an illness , right .
6,null,null,I have never been to a doctor to have my condition properly diagnosed or treated .
7,null,null,At the moment , I really can not face my doctor with that sort of issue ( btw , I am in my mid-40s and I have suffered from depression since as long as i can remember )
8,null,null,- I have learned to cope , in a fashion , but .
9,null,null,probably at the expense of a reasonable sense of social ' normality'- i.e. divorced , emotionally empty relationships , enormous amounts of time spent alone , dissatisfied working life , etc
10,null,null,One covers up & , and
11,null,null,disguises the depression at work , at home
12,null,null,wherever / whenever necessary ..
13,null,null,and then , when you are all alone , the demons can come out to play(or even before you are alone ) -
14,null,null,but at least you maintain the expected external masculine dignity , most of the time .
15,null,null,For example , today my son wanted to come over to visit me but
16,null,null,because I have been feeling so miserable and morbid and soaked in ennui this week , I made an excuse to put off his visit because I did not want him to see me feeling low & depressed(and weak ) and thus ruining his day / week .
17,null,null,Instead , I went out on a freezing 10 mile walk alone to try to physically squash the depression .
18,null,null,This is a regular occurrence - I get depressed , I hate myself for being weak , so ..
19,null,null,I do something physical to try to alleviate the symptoms(and also to punish myself for feeling depressed )
20,null,null,it works .. temporarily .
21,null,null,In my mind , this sort of masochism is ( or
22,null,null,has been)preferable to taking alcohol , drugs ( even prescribed medicines ) , fags , therapy or inflicting real self - harm and so forth because , at least , it keeps me feeling physically fit - physically
23,null,null,balanced(and
24,null,null,I guess that is important to me ) even if it is not always an effective cure for one is depression .

27,null,null,yes , it seems a lot of men do tend to suffer depression in silence
28,null,null,( one wonders
29,null,null,what the real percentage could be!).When I joined this group

1,null,null,Hi everyone .
2,null,null,I am a 26 yrold mom of three , 6 and under .
3,null,null,My depression started as a teenager , but
4,null,null,somehow back then I was able to " talk myself out of it " and perhaps had enough going on to keep me distracted .
5,null,null,I got married right after high school , and
6,null,null,nine months later , ( overnight , really ) became a mom .
7,null,null,I never intended to be a mom at nineteen .
8,null,null,I had dreamed of going to college , enjoying years of freedom with my husband , and
9,null,null,then , carefully " planning " our first child .
10,null,null,Well , seven years later , we have planned only one ( our last ) , and strangely enough my only planned child was the hardest to recover from emotionally .
11,null,null,After the birth of my first child I struggled with denial over all my crushed dreams , and .
12,null,null,fought back depression and suicide on a daily basis
13,null,null,I saw a psychiatrist who put me on various medicines over the next few months , to no significant improvement .
14,null,null,When my daughter was three months old
15,null,null,I was voluntarily committed to a behavioral health facility and .
16,null,null,stayed there four days
17,null,null,I came out fully charged , and
18,null,null,within a matter of days , was right back where I started .
19,null,null,So I started seeing a therapist who did me little good , and .
20,null,null,continued on the latest medicine combination I was prescribed
21,null,null,Shortly after my daughter turned one I finally gave up on the medicines and the therapy and pretended to be better , even though I was not , because of the sheer frustration that nothing was " helping " so I might as well just get on with life .
22,null,null,I continued to battle depression and suicide on a daily basis , and .
23,null,null,also struggled with behavior that was contrary to what a good mother should be
24,null,null,My husband was military , and
25,null,null,it is during times in his absence that I have become " her " , my alter ego , someone who is intolerant , impatient , selfish , and ugly towards my kids .
26,null,null,And blah , blah , blah .
27,null,null,Do you guys get tired of telling your life story , because I do .
28,null,null,I have lost count of how many times I have told it to various therapists in some vain attempt to help them understand me .
29,null,null,So let me tell you where I am now .
30,null,null,I am a person who is deeply confused .
31,null,null,On the one hand I dearly love my kids , my husband , and
32,null,null,I have the desire to live life and see my children grow and strengthen my relationship with them and my husband .
33,null,null,On the other hand , I am sapped of every last ounce of purpose , life becomes extremely monotonous , and
34,null,null,I strain to see the point of it all .
35,null,null,Even now , as I write this , I am wondering , " why am I wasting my time ?
36,null,null,These people will never know one tenth of a percent of what is going on inside me . "
37,null,null,And that is how I have left every therapy session I have ever gone to , feeling like my time was utterly wasted and
38,null,null,like I have made a chicken scratch in an issue solid as ice and twenty feet deep .
39,null,null,I balance on a fragile thread of life and death and
40,null,null,I am scared that it is only a matter of time before something tips
41,null,null,the balance just far enough that I finally do " it " .
42,null,null,My biggest fear is that by the time I find a way to heal myself , if I make it that far , my kids will have paid the ultimate price and be a product of confusion and sadness too .
43,null,null,I am sick and tired of trying to feel human .
44,null,null,In talking with others , I feel intangible , fake , this intellect in human form but incapable of human understanding .
45,null,null,My emotions are real ; love , hate , empathy , grief , anger , happiness , but
46,null,null,I still do not feel " real " .
47,null,null,I feel like I am missing some vital component that ties it all together , and
48,null,null,without it , I am nothing more than this body walking around , emulating those around me , operating on some kind of autopilot .
49,null,null,It goes beyond frustration and confusion , and
50,null,null,I feel this pent up rage building inside of me , and I want to scream at the top of my lungs until I turn blue , throw a chair through a window , send dishes crashing to the floor , something through which I can channel the anger and get it as far from me as possible .
51,null,null,And then , sorrow .
52,null,null,Black as an abyss , tormenting hopelessness , and
53,null,null,it is then that I contemplate suicide .
54,null,null,Fortunately ( or not )
55,null,null,I will then remember something , some reason for why I can not do it .
56,null,null,The other day was my sisters birthday .
57,null,null,I did not want her to have to remember her birthday as the day her sister killed herself .
58,null,null,Then I bawl , because there is no way out .
59,null,null,I can not leave , and
60,null,null,staying means continued torment for me and the people I love , and for some reason , love me .
61,null,null,How long must I endure this cycle ?
62,null,null,Once again I am off medication .
63,null,null,After the birth of my third child I went on the latest wonder drug , Lexapro , and after a year with no improvement
64,null,null,I have abandoned that as well .
65,null,null,I also made another mental health check in when the baby ( now 1 1/2 ) was a few months old , for six days in duration , and .
66,null,null,once again came out feeling like a hundred bucks only to crash again
67,null,null,I have examined the perspective that , like the books title , " Depression is a Choice " , and .
68,null,null,have even embraced the idea
69,null,null,I have also embraced the idea that it is certainly not a choice , and
70,null,null,that medication is the solution , with equally unhelpful results .
71,null,null,I grow weary of this fruitless search to " fix myself " .
72,null,null,For those of you who would suggest God , yes I am a believer .
73,null,null,I turned to him three years ago , after years of Agnosticism , in utter desperation to fill in the " missing link " .
74,null,null,But for whatever reason , He still is not enough .
75,null,null,Which is the biggest blow of all , because I truly comprehend the sacrifice that was made in my behalf with the Atonement , and yet for some reason fail to utilize it .
76,null,null,So here I am .
77,null,null,One big mess .
78,null,null,And I am joining the group , lucky you !
79,null,null,See you around

8,null,null,Context : I am a 20 year old girl .

13,null,null,I was completely , for want of a better word , normal .

31,null,null,I began to feel a creeping anxiety looming up on me , that told me to not bother others , that by interacting with others I was causing them inconvenience and discomfort , and the best thing for me to do was to just be alone .

34,null,null,I am pretty sure that she was crossing ANY acceptable line , no matter what culture .
35,null,null,Firstly she would be very rude to me in front of all my classmates .

45,null,null,Oh planyourspontaneity needs to learn how to make some friends ' .

48,null,null,daily victimisation began to really grate and tear down my self esteem .

50,null,null,I began to be completely mute in class , ignoring the teacher .

 (0, 0),
1,null,null,I want to share a personal project I am proud of
2,null,null,A month ago I was feeling completely unmotivated to do anything .
3,null,null,I was feeling that none of my connections with friends are as deep as they used to be , that I am not as close to my family as I used to be , that nothing I do at work really matters , and that my health is slowly deteriorating .
4,null,null,I just wanted to quit at everything .
5,null,null,Then I was hanging out with a friend I had not seen in a while , and
6,null,null,he admitted to me that he had been struggling with depression , so we both opened up about it .
7,null,null,He ended up recommending the book "
8,null,null,Feeling Good " to me , since it had helped him improve a lot .
9,null,null,I read it and ..
10,null,null,was initially a bit disappointed
11,null,null,some parts were underwhelming , some felt annoying / condescending , and
12,null,null,the solution to every problem seemed to be the " three - column technique . "
13,null,null,But after trying a few of the exercises in the book , I admit it turned out to be somewhat helpful .
14,null,null,One of the exercises / quizzes in the book is the " Depression Checklist , " which ( as I am sure many of you are aware of )
15,null,null,assesses your level of depression on a scale from 1 to 100 .
16,null,null,At the time , I was scoring in the " Moderate " range .
17,null,null,After a couple weeks of applying some of the exercises , I was down to the " Mild " range .
18,null,null,So I decided to create a project that might help me learn a bit more about myself , with regard to the effect of my daily habits on my level of depression .
19,null,null,What I wanted to build was a simple web app that would let me score my productivity on a daily basis ( based on exercising , reading , socializing , meditating , etc ) and .
20,null,null,then plot that against my daily depression score
21,null,null,I wanted to see if there was a correlation between higher productivity and lower depression , or .
22,null,null,if certain activities had a greater impact on my mood
23,null,null,Ironically what I discovered was that working on the project itself was a huge mood - booster for me , since it gave me a sense of purpose and was a great outlet for creativity .
24,null,null,As I have gotten further along in the work , I have noticed my depression level has slowly started rising again .
25,null,null,But for a while , I was actually in the " Normal " range of depressive emotions !
26,null,null,I could not believe it .
27,null,null,Regardless , the project has also given me more insight into a few things that drastically help my mood .
28,null,null,Even though my mood is not at the level it was a couple weeks ago , it is nice to know that investing in personal projects gives me a lot of satisfaction
29,null,null,( Also if anyone is interested in trying out the app , feel free to check it out [ here ] ( ) .
30,null,null,It is stupid simple and still a work in progress , but
31,null,null,I am still kinda proud of it ..
32,null,null,and if it were able to help even just one other person , that would make me pretty happy & lt;3 )

6,null,null,The best way to get vitamin D is through certain food combinations and routines in sitting in delicate morning sunlight and in most cases , taking a supplement is necessary to keep this vitamin flowing in your body .

7,null,null,i can not really think too well and
8,null,null,it is making me want to drink .
9,null,null,Drinking slows down my mind somewhat
10,null,null,so i can focus on things in my head .
11,null,null,Normally its not till the next day after a good night of drinking that i feel good for most of the next day .
12,null,null,i am more talkative and .
13,null,null,can come up with things much easier

29,null,null,got up the nerve to tell him but thought he gave me some good info he probably thought i was mad
30,null,null,Anyway one of the first things your body will do when it is over exerted is give u fuzzy vision .
31,null,null,Now normally night blindness is caused be a vitamin A deficiency .

1,null,null,My formative years were spent in small towns .
2,null,null,Until the third grade , I lived in Indiana .
3,null,null,From the third grade through my junior year in high school , I lived in a small lakeside community in southwestern Michigan .
4,null,null,You could walk or .
5,null,null,ride your bike to anywhere - down to the lake , out on country roads , wherever
6,null,null,My father was a Lutheran school teacher , principal and church organist .
7,null,null,From time to time , he would take a " call " to serve in another Lutheran school in a different town .
8,null,null,In the summer of 1968 , right after my junior year in high school , he decided to take a call to a school in the north side of the city of St. Louis .
9,null,null,It was quite a culture shock for a sheltered young woman who had only lived in small , insular towns
10,null,null,all her life , to move to a city the size of St. Louis .
11,null,null,Quite honestly , when we arrived here I absolutely hated it .
12,null,null,I felt as if I would been thrown to the dark side of the moon .
13,null,null,I had to start my senior year in a new high school in a completely foreign environment .
14,null,null,Everyone else already had their group or circle of friends going back at least three years .
15,null,null,Now you had to have a lot more guts and fortitude and self - esteem
16,null,null,than I had at the time to break into already established groups and make new friends .
17,null,null,This was the year that would set the stage for the first major depressive episode in my life .
18,null,null,This was the year of my first therapist , the first of many to come .
19,null,null,The start of a lifetime of self - discovery .

24,null,null,eat well , and walk 5 + miles every morning

27,null,null,At the time , I did not realize anything was going on , or
28,null,null,I simply did not understand it .

39,null,null,and I have not understood why .

9,null,null,I still ponder whether I have a iproblemi .

11,null,null,I will be doing fine and
12,null,null,then a ilight switchi goes off , and I get a bad case of the blues .
13,null,null,These can last for a few of days .
14,null,null,In my mind , I know that everything is actually okay , but
15,null,null,I can not shake the idowni feeling .
16,null,null,I also have frequent bouts of being istressed - outi .
17,null,null,By this I mean that all of the tasks that I need to get done seem to be insurmountable and that there will never be enough time to get things done .
18,null,null,I sometimes break down in tears during my more manic attacks of frustration and worry .
19,null,null,Life seems to have become one long list of stuff to do .
20,null,null,Even the fun stuff has become something to get done so that I can move on to the next day .
21,null,null,As for itriggersi , as I have been reading about in your posts , I know that I have two major issues .
22,null,null,I do not deal well with my emotions when my husband gets angry ( not abusive , just normal iguy angryi ) or
23,null,null,I feel that I have somehow iscrewed - upi and let him down by not doing something right .
24,null,null,I turn very inward and
25,null,null,the ilight switchi goes off .
26,null,null,My second issues deals with embarrassment .
27,null,null,I do not take embarrassment well .
28,null,null,My stress / anxiety over getting the housework done stems from my concern that people may come over and I will be embarrassed by the state of the house ( in fact , the house is always neat and clean , if a bit disheveled by daily life ) .
29,null,null,I often worry about whether I embarrassed myself during social outings or at parties with my friends .
30,null,null,My husband reassures me , but
31,null,null,that does not usually ease my worry .
32,null,null,My ObGyn gave me Sarafem ( Prozac 20 mg ) three weeks ago , and
33,null,null,I seem to be operating on a more even keel these days .
34,null,null,The lows are not as low
35,null,null,and I seem to be able to let more stuff just roll off my back .
36,null,null,I am pleased with the results , and
37,null,null,my husband has seen a real improvement , but I am still asking myself the basic question as to whether I am indeed ill .

 (0, 0),
1,null,null,Beautifully Broken I have spent most of my life afraid to be my true self because I believed that if I did not live up to the standards and norms that I grew up with , I would not be accepted .
2,null,null,I was told since a young age how I should act , talk , and dress .
3,null,null,I was told that money was important and that attending societal events and bullshit balls was your key to social success .
4,null,null,And those things , trying to feel important , had meant everything to me .
5,null,null,But then life screws you over and .
6,null,null,suddenly your perspective on everything changes
7,null,null,I learned that I no longer wanted to be the person that everyone said I had to be and things that had once seemed important became trivial .
8,null,null,I realized that I did not give a fuck if I had Tory Burch shoes or a Chanel bag .
9,null,null,No amount of money could ever bring me happiness , which was clearly evident in the money that was spent on
10,null,null,I am sorry shopping trips and my therapist .
11,null,null,Things started falling apart at home when I was 15 years old .
12,null,null,So my remedy to broken family was to drink until I could not feel .
13,null,null,But despite my new fond love of alcohol and its pain killing effects , I kept my life together .
14,null,null,I worked hard in school , I stayed active in my community , and
15,null,null,I made sure people thought I was keeping it together .
16,null,null,I could not let everyone know that I was a fucking mess .
17,null,null,But in this process , I slowly lost myself and .
18,null,null,started living two different lives
19,null,null,When the curtains were wide open , people saw a girl that was very studious , .
20,null,null,had many accomplishment is , and always had a smile on her face
21,null,null,But as soon as the curtains closed and I was alone , my demons came out .
22,null,null,And the more I hid , the more I lost myself .
23,null,null,At one point , the alcohol was not enough .
24,null,null,Things had only gotten worse at home
25,null,null,and I needed a new escape .
26,null,null,The first time I did it , it was a pair of scissors .
27,null,null,It was small , barely noticeable .
28,null,null,I had sworn after the first time that I would never hurt myself again .
29,null,null,But eventually I did , and
30,null,null,when I left for college it had only gotten worse .
31,null,null,By my second year of college , I had reached my lowest point .
32,null,null,I was in a toxic , emotionally abusive , relationship .
33,null,null,I had a broken relationship with my parents , who spent most of their time stuck in a cycle of fighting , not speaking , and then pretending that they were okay .
34,null,null,I had not spoken to my older brother , a struggling addict at the time , in almost a year .
35,null,null,I no longer knew who I was .
36,null,null,So one night I went out and .
37,null,null,bought a bottle of wine with my fake ID and went back to my apartment and chugged the entire thing
38,null,null,I sat on my bathroom floor crying , staring at the knife in my hand .
39,null,null,And in the back of my mind I thought about the gun that was a few feet away from me hidden in a book that my dad had given me for protection .
40,null,null,For the first time in my life , I had looked at mortality straight in the face .
41,null,null,I had questioned it many times , but
42,null,null,it was never like that night .
43,null,null,Eventually the crying stopped and
44,null,null,the numbness came , a feeling I had become all too familiar with .
45,null,null,Would I do it ?
46,null,null,Could I do it ?
47,null,null,Would anyone care ?
48,null,null,I was consumed with darkness , but
49,null,null,there was a small flicker of light , of hope .
50,null,null,I wanted to help people , I wanted to one day to change the world , or .
51,null,null,at the very least change one person is life
52,null,null,I was not ready to leave just yet ,
53,null,null,so I held on to the tiny amount of hope that was left in me .
54,null,null,I called the cops and .
55,null,null,was admitted into a psychiatric center
56,null,null,I spent 48 hours in a white walled , emotionless , prison like place .
57,null,null,And not once did someone ask me if I was okay .
58,null,null,My parents came up to see me and had a difficult time accepting what had happened and
59,null,null,I did not understand why .
60,null,null,They knew I wanted help , they saw the scars on my arms , and
61,null,null,they knew that I was not okay .
62,null,null,They blamed my relationship with my then boyfriend and .
63,null,null,told me to never speak of this to anyone
64,null,null,They did not want people to know I was crazy .
65,null,null,Was I ?
66,null,null,During that time , I came to believe I was , but
67,null,null,now I understand that I was just broken .
68,null,null,It is been over three years since that happened and
69,null,null,although I still struggled with a lot after that , I am now in a better place .
70,null,null,The reason I am writing this is because I promised myself to one day .
71,null,null,help the 15-year - old me whose cries for help where tossed to the side , who was told she was over - dramatic and crazy , and who thought that cutting was the only way to cope
72,null,null,There was a reason I grew up surrounded by mental illness .
73,null,null,I watched not only
74,null,null,myself go through it , but I saw my brother , my parents , my friends , and so many people on the news struggling with their own demons .
75,null,null,And this did not happen because life felt like fucking me over , it was just trying to show me what my reason for living is .
76,null,null,I spent years ashamed of the person I was because I was scared to show people my true , raw , fucked up self .
77,null,null,But is not that the problem ?
78,null,null,When it comes to having a mental illness , we believe the stigmas that come attached to it
79,null,null,and we are afraid to speak up and talk about it .
80,null,null,And the people who are lucky enough to not experience it , do not want to talk about it either .
81,null,null,The only difference from how mental illness was treated a hundred years ago and now , is that we no longer hide and chain our family members in basements or attics , but the shame and embarrassment is still there .
82,null,null,And I want to change that .
83,null,null,I want to remove the stigmas and stereotypes attached to mental illness and get people talking .
84,null,null,But change starts with me , and
85,null,null,that means that I can not be afraid to share my experiences .
86,null,null,This is who I am
87,null,null,and I would not change my life for anything in the world because now I truly understand what it is like to live with a mental illness .
88,null,null,I finally know what the difference between sympathy and empathy is , and
89,null,null,that is one of the greatest gifts that could have come out from this .
90,null,null,I will be exploring different topics on mental illness while trying to find ways to change the way people think and talk about it .
91,null,null,I will not only be looking at the psychological background of mental illness , but .
92,null,null,the neurological background as well
93,null,null,More and more scientists are publishing articles on different alternative treatments that do not involve medications .
94,null,null,One of my favorite topics , which I will soon explore in more detail , is neuroplasticity , or
95,null,null,the brains way of re - wiring itself to create new circuits , and .
96,null,null,essentially a new you
97,null,null,I have set a goal to one day create a facility for those who are afflicted with a mental illness .
98,null,null,But instead of white walls , cold stares from employees , and isolation , they will be surrounded by beautiful colors , the outdoors , and people who actually care .
99,null,null,Our current mental health system is completely and utterly fucked up .
100,null,null,We can not keep over - medicating people and .
101,null,null,throwing them out into the world with absolutely no regard for their actual well - being
102,null,null,If these treatments were actually working , we would not be seeing an alarmingly increasing rate of mental illness .
103,null,null,It is time to re - define mental illness and stick a middle finger up to all the people who tell you that you are crazy or different .
104,null,null,And maybe I am crazy , I am sure as hell different , but
105,null,null,that does not make me any less of a person .
106,null,null,I am proud of who I have become
107,null,null,and now I know what the purpose of my life is , and
108,null,null,I am not going to stop chasing it .
109,null,null,-RBZ
110,null,null,Sometimes the most beautiful people are beautifully broken -r.m .

17,null,null,She also told me that my grandfather did not die of cancer , apparently he was an alcoholic , and .
18,null,null,when we where kids he threw himself at the well they had on the backyard
19,null,null,All this just made me realize that people do not kill themselves , depression kills people the same way cancer does .
20,null,null,People who have not struggled with this can not even imagine what is living with depression and often blame a person who is basically ill .
21,null,null,My mother also gave me the best advice i have ever recieved .
22,null,null,She told me that I was not on this earth just to find a job and live the best way i could just by buying things , that it did not matter if i did not find a huge reason to live ; just by being there i was already the reason for my mother and many others to live and be happy , the same way she was for me .

4,null,null,I was attending mandatory group therapy after an attempted suicide and 72 miserable hours in the nut house .
5,null,null,They put me on Remeron which helped a little .. taking some of the edge off the suicidal thoughts , but little else .
6,null,null,Weeks of trying to learn cognitive behavior therapy went by and .
7,null,null,hopes of getting better
8,null,null,were dwindling
9,null,null,Then one day , my best friend gave me a book which taught me how to properly apply the CBT .
10,null,null,Many of you have tried CBT to no avail .
11,null,null,I sincerely believe that you did not do it either properly , hard enough , and / or long enough .
12,null,null,When retraining the mind , it is vitally important to diligently apply CBT daily for several weeks .
13,null,null,( See my webpage for more info : Antidepressant That Works ) .
14,null,null,Once this becomes a regular habit , I am confident you will see improvement as I did .
15,null,null,I am positive you can do it too .
16,null,null,It was the toughest job I have ever had to do , but
17,null,null,it sure was worth it .
18,null,null,Whenever a negative situation presents itself now , I just block it out and .
19,null,null,replace it with a positive thought automatically
20,null,null,It is hard in the beginning , but
21,null,null,it is totally do - able .
22,null,null,Plus , it gets easier after awhile .
23,null,null,Then , once it becomes automatic , you do not even have to think about it .
24,null,null,Properly applied CBT helps tremendously , but
25,null,null,it is not a complete cure as you will see in my story .
26,null,null,You must also take care of your body because it is what furnishes your brain with the proper nutrients .
27,null,null,The two go hand in hand .
28,null,null,The brain regulates the endocrine system and the neurotransmitters while the body provides the brain with the proper chemicals to do its job .
29,null,null,Leisure activities help also .
30,null,null,I know it is difficult for some of you to have fun , but
31,null,null,it is important to get your mind off your problems even if just for a little while .
32,null,null,I mention motivation in my story .
33,null,null,Sometimes you just have to force yourself to do what is good for you even if you do not want to .
34,null,null,Contrary to what many believe , motivation begins with action ..
35,null,null,not visa - versa .
36,null,null,The sooner you begin to properly apply the techniques I learned and the more effort you put in to them , the sooner you will get better .
37,null,null,Hopelessness and doubt will be your enemy , .
38,null,null,so try to put them aside for a month as you get on the road to wellness
39,null,null,I have been off antidepressants for almost a year now .
40,null,null,I feel great ..
41,null,null,plus my concentration and comprehension are back .
42,null,null,March 5 marked my one year anniversary without alcohol too .
43,null,null,I am basically drug free and .
44,null,null,am as happy as I was 5 years ago before the depression nearly ruined my life

1,null,null,I am a hetero man , 35 , divorced , no kids .
2,null,null,I can honestly say that I feel empathy towards any guy who suffers from depression .
3,null,null,Some of my closest guy friends have admitted to me their many bouts of battling these demons , just as I have shared my horror stories and near suicidal incidents , and
4,null,null,we all have empathy with each other over that stuff .
5,null,null,I am beginning to not give a crap anymore about depression being viewed as just a " woman " issue ; it is what it is and .
6,null,null,to heck with gender stereotypes
7,null,null,The things I have noticed the most are my friends ' unwillingness to consult a therapist or take medication , but
8,null,null,perhaps their bouts of depression are not the " bed - ridden " variety that I have gone through .
9,null,null,Or maybe this is their way of not feeling " completely weak " .
10,null,null,Most of my friends will either drink excessively or .
11,null,null,take drugs to deal with this stuff

13,null,null,in the end it just made me feel worse .

15,null,null,that did not work .

17,null,null,still the depression lingered .

1106 49
 (0, 0),
1,null,null,The Irony of Loneliness in an Overpopulated World
2,null,null,As I spend more time in the presence of depression , I have tried to apply a further focus to understand what is actually going on in my head .
3,null,null,Dealing with the sudden appearance of depression has been a nightmare and a half to deal with to say the least .
4,null,null,So in response , I regularly attempt to interpret the spiral of self loathing thoughts and whirlwind of emotions that march throughout my mind .
5,null,null,My initial reaction to a diagnosis of major depression and multiple failed suicide attempts has been to run away from everything that reeks of painful memories , both theoretically and literally :
6,null,null,*
7,null,null,I write this post 7,00 kilometres from my home country , in Japan , where I aim to live for the next couple of years .
8,null,null,*
9,null,null,I have ghosted those whom I use to call my close friends .
10,null,null,*
11,null,null,I left all social media in order to avoid contacting people that I knew , and .
12,null,null,because looking at how happy other people were brought me down
13,null,null,*
14,null,null,I changed my image drastically over the past year as an outward expression of the fact that I am trying to change as a person .
15,null,null,It is here in Japan that I have come to a terrifying realisation .
16,null,null,I can not run from depression .
17,null,null,Here I am , in a country where people speak a totally different language and immersed in a totally different culture to my own , writing a post about depression .
18,null,null,Recently , I was walking the streets in search for job opportunities when I sunk into a depressed mood and began thinking about my place in the world
19,null,null,( which always turns out well ) .
20,null,null,Nothing actually matters .
21,null,null,We work in order to pay rent , in order to stay in the same place , so that we can reliably keep a job so that we can pay rent .
22,null,null,It is in this meaninglessness that humans as social beings look to others for comfort .
23,null,null,Our lives are but .
24,null,null,a meaningless speck in an expanding universe
25,null,null,That is quite the depressing thought ..
26,null,null,And it is .
27,null,null,But why is it that when another body is lying on top of mine , or when I am held in a warm embrace , this thought does not have any impact on me ?
28,null,null,I have done quite a bit of thinking by myself , and .
29,null,null,have talked to a bunch of people from back in the psychiatric ward on what ' fixes ' us
30,null,null,And the unfortunate answer for most of us is .. Nothing .
31,null,null,We can not be fixed .
32,null,null,It is just how our minds work .
33,null,null,But what if we do not have to be fixed ?
34,null,null,The hardest part about depression for me , is the intensity of the loneliness I feel .
35,null,null,When I am at my worst , I am so focused on my own loneliness and the meaninglessness of my relationships , that the few connections I do have , I dismiss .
36,null,null,Now , this is not the case for all people suffering from depression .
37,null,null,For a lot of people , their negative emotions are driven by a sense of worthlessness , meaninglessness or sadness .
38,null,null,But the general consensus is , although we can not ' fix ' ourselves , we can have people around us to support us when we are at our lowest .
39,null,null,And it makes sense that as social beings , human intimacy provides us with a safety net for when depression is hitting us the hardest .
40,null,null,Unfortunately for most of us , the type of physical and emotional intimacy that we strive for is unobtainable .
41,null,null,In my life , depression is caused me to push away the people that I have spent time building connections with , and .
42,null,null,has limited the amount of contact I have had with strangers and people I COULD connect that with
43,null,null,I think it is ironic .
44,null,null,It is ironic that in such an overpopulated world , depression is such a big issue .
45,null,null,We are the people that need intimacy the most , so you would think we would be in a position where intimacy is more readily available .
46,null,null,But that is not how the world works .
47,null,null,Our lives are still meaningless .
48,null,null,We still hate ourselves .
49,null,null,And we are still alone .

 (0, 0),
1,null,null,I have not felt anything in over a month .
2,null,null,I have struggled with depression for a few years now , and
3,null,null,I was doing really well .
4,null,null,I met a girl online that seemed absolutely perfect , and
5,null,null,she made me feel truly happy for the first time since I was little .
6,null,null,In October , she just stopped replying to me .
7,null,null,She sent a message a few weeks later faking to be a family member and lied about committing suicide .
8,null,null,I just feel nothing anymore after that .
1108 58
 (0, 0),
1,null,null,Why depression is , and
2,null,null,is not like a skinned knee :
3,null,null,Some thoughts I had that I wanted to share
4,null,null,I was just pondering depression , and
5,null,null,I decided to jot down what I was thinking .
6,null,null,It is sort of a good way to put words to what it feels like to suffer from depression .
7,null,null,_
8,null,null,_
9,null,null,Why it IS like a skinned knee : Depression usually comes in episodes for me , and .
10,null,null,a lot of people I have talked to
11,null,null,Sometimes I will be doing okay , and .
12,null,null,then have a really bad day , or even a bad week
13,null,null,These episodes are sort of like skinning your knee .
14,null,null,When you were little , skinning your knee feels like the absolute worst thing in the world .
15,null,null,You think , " OW , THIS HURTS SO MUCH !
16,null,null,WHAT 'S HAPPENING TO ME ? !
17,null,null," You feel so helpless .
18,null,null,When you are an adult and skin your knee , you know what to do .
19,null,null,You know that you are supposed to clean it , and put a bandage on it .
20,null,null,And that is exactly what you do ; you do not make a fuss .
21,null,null,But , even though you clean it and bandage it , it is of course still going to hurt .
22,null,null,It is a cut .
23,null,null,You just ignore the pain , though , because you have already taken care of it , and
24,null,null,there is not much else you can do beyond that .
25,null,null,You just have to live with the fact that it is going to hurt for a while .
26,null,null,Depression is the exact same way .
27,null,null,When it happens , you know what you should do to handle it .
28,null,null,The best way , backed by science and research , is what we have all heard countless times : Exercise , eat healthy , do something nice for yourself , clean your living space , listen to happy music , watch TV shows that make you happy , etc .
29,null,null,So you know to do this stuff .
30,null,null,But of course , it is not going to magically feel 100 % better right off the bat .
31,null,null,There is still that emotional pain there , just like the way a skinned knee stings .
32,null,null,But you have already done everything you can to take care of it , so you have to live with it and wait patiently for the pain to go away .
33,null,null,_
34,null,null,_
35,null,null,Why depression ISN'T like a skinned knee
36,null,null,: Most people know that depression has a way of demotivating sufferers .
37,null,null,Things you once enjoyed no longer interest you .
38,null,null,Nothing seems like it has a point .
39,null,null,But this also affects your drive to treat your depression .
40,null,null,When you skin your knee , you just take care of it right away , you do not give any second thought to it .
41,null,null,It is just what you do .
42,null,null,With depression , you know that you should be exercising , eating healthy , listening to happy music , cleaning , etc .
43,null,null,But you do not .
44,null,null,What is the point ?
45,null,null,The difference is , that depression makes you NOT want to get better , or more accurately , not care about getting better .
46,null,null,Sometimes , you are just apathetic and nihilistic , " What is the point ?
47,null,null,I do not care .
48,null,null,Getting better is too much effort .
49,null,null," Sometimes , you just want to wallow in your own despair .
50,null,null,For me , when I feel this way , it is because I feel worthless and self - loathing .
51,null,null,I think , " I deserve to feel this way .
52,null,null,I deserve this emotional pain that I am going through .
53,null,null,I do not deserve to feel better , or to be happy .
54,null,null," That is the vicious cycle that depression uses to keep you down .
55,null,null,If you are reading this and have depression , I hope this helps you understand your own illness a little more clearly .
56,null,null,If you are reading this and you do not have depression , I hope this gives you a good account of what it is like , .
57,null,null,so you can empathize with people who have depression
58,null,null,Stay safe , everyone .

1135 88
 (0, 0),
1,null,null,I am in a reflective mood today .
2,null,null,I received a phone call this afternoon from the sister of my old neighbor , who I will call Alice .
3,null,null,She had passed away this morning .
4,null,null,Alice had been fighting terminal colon cancer since March and
5,null,null,after harsh chemo therapy and a bout with pneumonia that landed her in the ICU , she decided that enough was enough .
6,null,null,She stopped treatment just around the July 4th weekend .
7,null,null,I am not too exact on the details , but .
8,null,null,suffice it to say that she failed quickly after that and passed away in her sleep this morning surrounded by family and friends
9,null,null,She was only 52 .
10,null,null,As I struggle with Depression , AD / HD , tic disorders , sleep apnea , insomnia , food allergies , pollen allergies , and a weak immunity system I sometimes feel that life is unfair .
11,null,null,I used to say that the Universe was out to get me , that God is having his little joke with me .
12,null,null,I suppose it is only natural to feel that way .
13,null,null,It is a full plate and
14,null,null,I am not too hungry for what is on the menu .
15,null,null,Then I encounter other people with other hardships
16,null,null,and I see that life itself is not fair to an awful lot of people .
17,null,null,Life is , in fact , a lousy chef .
18,null,null,What struck me as sad today , however , was not simply the passing of somebody I knew .
19,null,null,Instead I was struck with my own mortality and weakness .
20,null,null,Let me explain .
21,null,null,Alice and some other neighbors had not been too kind to me when I moved into the area .
22,null,null,They had accused me of various deviant behaviors that to this day still anger me .
23,null,null,These were supposed to be my Christian brothers and sisters
24,null,null,and instead they wielded stones .
25,null,null,The rumors mounted as the months progressed , wilder and wilder , until they reached a crescendo where they became so outlandish that it was easy to disprove them .
26,null,null,When all the furor amounted to nothing a lot of people were left with egg on their face .
27,null,null,That summer several of the families involved moved away .
28,null,null,I have unresolved issues with them , but
29,null,null,with Alice , my neighbor , I was able to find forgiveness in my heart .
30,null,null,The story did not end happily there with us arm in arm , though .
31,null,null,Alice never really apologized to me , though her behavior towards my family and myself became kinder .
32,null,null,Unfortunately , she was one of the people I knew who did not believe in AD / HD .
33,null,null,One day she told me her opinion on the subject right to my face after I mentioned I had it .
34,null,null,I was so stunned by her bold opinion that I stood there slack jawed .
35,null,null,I swore that day I would never let that happen to me again .
36,null,null,You see a bit of that fire in this blog whenever anybody accuses me of not having a " real " problem .
37,null,null,I am as fierce in person as well .
38,null,null,Thanks to Alice .
39,null,null,And now she is passed on .
40,null,null,Suddenly my anger feels petty and shallow .
41,null,null,She moved away and , but
42,null,null,now has died
43,null,null,I allowed her to change me .
44,null,null,I nursed a wound like an angry coal in my heart .
45,null,null,I forgave her for one thing , but .
46,null,null,held a grudge for another
47,null,null,She became representative of all the doubters in my life and
48,null,null,I used that as impetus for change .
49,null,null,What type of person does that make me ?
50,null,null,On top of that , I have set lofty goals for myself that are proving hard to meet .
51,null,null,Time is ticking and
52,null,null,my 40th birthday is but a scant five months away .
53,null,null,One of the byproducts of meeting those goals was to have a book with my name on it that I could bring into her elementary school classroom one day , slam on her desk , and
54,null,null,say " Ha ! "
55,null,null,- as if my success would mean anything to her .
56,null,null,As if that would prove my struggle with AD / HD was real .
57,null,null,How silly .
58,null,null,How foolish .
59,null,null,Alice was only thirteen years older than I.
60,null,null,I can blink and .
61,null,null,be 52 tomorrow
62,null,null,Mortality laughs at me and
63,null,null,replaces
64,null,null,all of life is menu items with sour grapes and rotten eggs .
65,null,null,What shall I order now ?
66,null,null,Usually , my sense of humor keeps my spirits alight .
67,null,null,Today , however , I see myself as being revealed as a small - minded man with insignificant goals .
68,null,null,That even for a moment , no matter how miniscule , I was sad she died before my goals were met ..
69,null,null,This both sickens me and .
70,null,null,splashes me in the face with a brisk dose of reality
71,null,null,December looms and
72,null,null,I read news ?
73,null,null,Time leaks through my fingers
74,null,null,and I am worried about a drop in comments on my blog ?
75,null,null,How did I get so turned around ?
76,null,null,Where did I get so terribly sidetracked ?
77,null,null,I need to remember what it is I want out of life .
78,null,null,It is not to show up the doubters but to find joy in my own accomplishments .
79,null,null,I know that , but
80,null,null,negative thought attaches itself to our most noble intentions like a parasite .
81,null,null,Allow it to stay too long and it consumes and replaces what was once good and uplifting .
82,null,null,I do not resent Alice .
83,null,null,I never wished her ill .
84,null,null,But I regret
85,null,null,I let myself hold a grudge , however slight it seemed .
86,null,null,Life is too short for such things .
87,null,null,So I will allow Alice to change me again .
88,null,null,That way when I order from the menu of life it will not be just desserts .
1136 67
 (0, 0),
1,null,null,Opened up to a " friend " about my depression .
2,null,null,It could have gone better .
3,null,null,Hello , Reddit .
4,null,null,I have never posted here before .
5,null,null,I am a bit nervous about sharing this story
6,null,null,( I am very shy , even anonymously ) , so
7,null,null,I want to thank you in advance for taking the time to read it .
8,null,null,I am hoping that just getting it off my chest will help , even if only a little .
9,null,null,Also , I am sorry if this post rambles on a bit or is incoherent at all , I am not in the best state of mind at the moment .
10,null,null,Earlier today , during our school is lunch break , I opened up to somebody I trusted about my depression and anxiety .
11,null,null,I have been on a steep downward spiral recently , and
12,null,null,this person had taken notice that something was wrong .
13,null,null,She sat me down , .
14,null,null,grabbed us a couple of sodas , and told me to spill my guts
15,null,null,Normally , I would have simply told her that everything was fine , and made some lame excuse like " I did not sleep well last night " or
16,null,null," I am just worried about my exam scores " .
17,null,null,But this was the first time that anybody had ever reached out to try and help , so
18,null,null,I decided to be truthful .
19,null,null,I thanked her for offering to listen , and .
20,null,null,explained that I had never shared this with anybody else , so I might struggle to fully express myself
21,null,null,She was understanding , and .
22,null,null,told me to take as much time as I needed
23,null,null,I was very careful not to unload everything on her , I basically told her exactly what I said at the start of this post : that I struggle with depression and anxiety , and that it is been getting a lot worse recently .
24,null,null,Initially , it seemed like it was going well .
25,null,null,She had several follow - up questions , some of which I was not entirely comfortable answering .
26,null,null,However , for the first time in years I felt a genuine sense of hope , and felt like someone actually cared about me , so I answered them anyway .
27,null,null,Eventually , she asked me what was causing all of this .
28,null,null,I explained that while there are certainly things that contribute to my depression on a day - to - day basis , at the root of it , there is not really a reason .
29,null,null,It is just who I am , almost as if it is hardwired into my brain .
30,null,null,It is hard to explain .
31,null,null,Do any of you understand what I am talking about ?
32,null,null,Anyway , this is where things took a turn .
33,null,null,While I was trying to explain that , she stopped me and .
34,null,null,said : " I am sorry , I can not do this
35,null,null,I offered to help cause I thought you were just having girl problems , or school problems , or something .
36,null,null,I did not realize you were totally emo .
37,null,null,We are not in high school anymore .
38,null,null,Besides , you are a guy , just toughen up " .
39,null,null,That last part stung .
40,null,null,I knew that was a common sentiment in our society , but
41,null,null,to hear it coming from her , someone I have been friends with since high school , really took me by surprise .
42,null,null,I did not know what to say , so I did not say anything .
43,null,null,I just kind of looked down at my lap .
44,null,null,We sat quietly for a moment , until she got up and started gathering her things .
45,null,null,As she started to walk away
46,null,null,I said : " I am sorry if I made you uncomfortable , I was not trying to do that . "
47,null,null,She looked back at me and
48,null,null,said : " Look , a big reason I am friends with you is because of your positive attitude .
49,null,null,It is infectious , and
50,null,null,I love that about you .
51,null,null,But if that is really just a mask , then you should probably just keep the mask on if we are going to continue being friends . " , and
52,null,null,then she left .
53,null,null,She texted me a few hours later and .
54,null,null,said : " I hope you are able to move past your issues so our friendship can move forward "
55,null,null,I have not responded , and .
56,null,null,do not plan to
57,null,null,I cry myself to sleep at night enough as it is without also worrying about maintaining a fake personality for her .
58,null,null,I probably will not be opening up to anyone like that again anytime soon ( except , of course , to all of you wonderful people on the internet ) .
59,null,null,Deep down , I know that most of the people in my life would not react the way she did .
60,null,null,But I just do not think I can build up the motivation to try it , not when I struggle just to get up in the morning .
61,null,null,I want to thank you all again .
62,null,null,Not just for reading my story , but .
63,null,null,for being a part of this community
64,null,null,Depression and anxiety really suck , and
65,null,null,nobody should have to suffer through them alone .
66,null,null,..
67,null,null,I am gon na go hug my pillow now .

1,null,null,Am I Depressed ?
2,null,null,While I have been distraught and suicidal on and off since age fifteen , I have never been formally diagnosed with anything because I do not trust the mental - health establishment .
3,null,null,I have only visited a shrink twice : once when forced by parents , a second time when pressured by a partner .
4,null,null,Because of this , I am reluctant to claim I am depressed except in the loose , colloquial sense .
5,null,null,Instead , I feel my rage and despair flow quite appropriately from my failure to fulfill my desires , .
6,null,null,achieve my dreams , and so on
7,null,null,I hate being alive and , but
8,null,null,would adore a sudden death , sure
9,null,null,that does not necessarily mean I am depressed , right ?
10,null,null,I do not experience many of the symptoms of formal depression
11,null,null,: I sleep pretty well most of the time , I eat okay , and
12,null,null,I am socially active .
13,null,null,( I feel abjectly isolated , but
14,null,null,empirically I spend a fair amount of time with friendly acquaintances at events and so on . )
15,null,null,I resist the medical model of my mental state because it assumes the problem is with me rather than with the world .
16,null,null,I figure I would be okay if I had the basic level of social success normal folks have : a number of close friends and a healthy romantic / sexual relationship with one or more partners .
17,null,null,I am becoming increasingly confident my genetics and values combine to make forming meaningful connections with other humans effectively impossible .
18,null,null,Because I yearn for such connections intensely , it is only rational that this dynamic would make my life unlivable .
19,null,null,I am not depressed .
20,null,null,My brain ai not malfunctioning ; it is as valid a pattern as any .
21,null,null,The uncaring universe approves of my mind as much as anyone is .
22,null,null,I am just not biologically equipped to thrive in the environments I find myself in .

4,null,null,Telling people they have biologically broken brains with insufficient brain chemistry , and bad genes ?
5,null,null,Psychiatrists / psychotherapist within the biopsycho model of human emotions ,
6,null,null,only drug , or involuntarily hopstialise people Telling people
7,null,null,they can not overcome their problems with life due to their bad brain which does not operate correctly and
8,null,null,the only thing they can do is take a psychiatric drug ?
9,null,null,Subjecting people to isolation and and
10,null,null,distancing themselves from people as different due to mental illness and subjugating the norm from the mentally ill subjecting people to drug trials they have ended up in suicide and mass homocide , all for the progress of psychiatric medicine Telling people that they have biological genetic brain diseases like schizophrenia
11,null,null,they will never really live a normal life .
12,null,null,Yet we are the stigmatisers ?
13,null,null,YOU'RE
14,null,null,the one who solicitates a lawyer when you have tried a psychiatric drug that almost made you kill yourself now you want to fight psychiatry
15,null,null,but you are okay with kids being chemically lobotomised on Ritalin ?

7,null,null,My uncle was a 28 yr old gay M , developed HIV and killed himself .
8,null,null,Though this is not what I was initially told .
9,null,null,It took around 10 years with every year or so getting a new piece of information .
10,null,null,Initially I was told he had cancer and died .
11,null,null,Then I was told he had cancer and my grandparents " pulled the plug " .
12,null,null,Then I was told he was gay , had cancer , and my grandparents " pulled the plug " .
13,null,null,Then I was told he was gay , had HIV , and
14,null,null,my grandparents " pulled the plug " .
15,null,null,Then , finally , I was told he was gay , had HIV and killed himself .
16,null,null,I think I secretly had an understanding of how he had killed himself even when I was a kid and was not told due to subtle hints that kids will typically pick up on .
17,null,null,Even if I did not , I always had the feeling that something was wrong and that my parents were not truthful .
18,null,null,After discussing his death for two hours for the study , I realized that the depression I have been feeling for over 12 years is so similar to the feeling I get when I think of my uncle .
19,null,null,Intense grief .
20,null,null,I delved into the feeling more and .
21,null,null,have not been able to stop crying for the past few days about my uncle

23,null,null,I know there is no time limit on emotions
24,null,null,but does it make sense for my depression to be as a result of shoving down his death and holding onto it for all this time ?

1,null,null,Reddit Secret Santa Saved My Life
2,null,null,.. I want to begin this by saying that I have been in a really dark place recently .
3,null,null,Combination of family issues , breakup , and finals put me in a really depressive state .
4,null,null,As a result , I would been having strong suicidal thoughts for weeks .
5,null,null,I had been seriously thinking about ending my own life .
6,null,null,So that is the context in which this occurs .
7,null,null,About a month ago I signed up for secret santa on a whim .
8,null,null,I had never done it before and .
9,null,null,honestly did not expect anything
10,null,null,But yesterday , my gift arrived .
11,null,null,I do not know who this person is , but
12,null,null,they spent at least $ 150 dollars on about 6 separate gifts .
13,null,null,They also included a really thoughtful and touching letter that talked about how they thought I was such a great person and how much they enjoyed learning about me .
14,null,null,I immediately broke down crying upon reading it .
15,null,null,It might seem small or sorta stupid , but
16,null,null,it made me feel like someone cared about me .
17,null,null,That I was not the idiotic nobody
18,null,null,my depression tells me I am all of the time .
19,null,null,I felt motivated and happy for the first time in weeks .
20,null,null,I cleaned my room and .
21,null,null,did work that I would been ignoring for months
22,null,null,I finally felt like maybe
23,null,null,, just maybe , I meant something .
24,null,null,It changed my life , and .
25,null,null,probably saved it
26,null,null,So whoever you are , thank you so much , and
27,null,null,I can not express how much this meant to me or thank you enough .
28,null,null,And let this be a lesson to everyone else .
29,null,null,The smallest act can and does make a difference .
30,null,null,Let is all try and use the Christmas season to ensure everyone feels a little more loved .

1,null,null,Nightmares and dreams HI , I do not know about you , but
2,null,null,when I was a kid I used to have this weird nightmares ( not the teeth fell out usual nightmares ) Like getting lost in a winter forest in pijamas just to be eaten up by wolves , being totally awake at my bed while insects ate me alive ( like sleep paralysis but dreaming ? ) or just watching my mother being eaten by feral dogs as she protected me .
3,null,null,Anyway , as I grew older and my depression grew with me , I stopped having nightmares , I can barely recall when the last one was .
4,null,null,Instead I have pretty vivid dreams ( not lucid ones ) and
5,null,null,in most of them , I am at some kind of weird scenery where I feel like I have always been there , and weird shit happens that I can remember , and it is like a full story , a lot of different things happen in the same dream .
6,null,null,The problem is , in most of them , I meet someone , normally a girl , with which I start a mutual relationship after overcoming some hardship , like , my biggest desire .
7,null,null,These dreams , as good as they sound , are worst than the nightmares because when I wake up , it takes some time to realize that I did not live that shit , that I am still in bed , and I am still alone .
