1,null,null,Writing out my feelings in hopes of gaining some sense of catharsis I would like to start by saying I do not think I am a danger to myself .
2,null,null,I am tethered here pretty strongly by my family and my best friend .
3,null,null,I can not see myself leaving them , because I have seen what it does to people when those closest to them go .
4,null,null,I resent the fact that I can not go , at times , but
5,null,null,there is nothing to be done about it really .
6,null,null,Most of the people in my life only ever knew my outer shell .
7,null,null,The somewhat false personality that I put on in order to function .
8,null,null,Over the last three years my mask has been crumbling away and
9,null,null,the results have not been pretty .
10,null,null,It is been a viscous feedback loop that leaves me feeling worse and worse as people fall out of my life one by one , either by their own choosing or because I distance myself to hide my pain as I become less and less able to handle it .
11,null,null,The summer after my sophomore year I was in the darkest place of my life .
12,null,null,I had to pull out of university and move home to get therapy .
13,null,null,It was actually very effective , and
14,null,null,my junior year was a home run .
15,null,null,I was getting the highest test scores in STEM classes with 600 students
16,null,null,, I was killing it in my philanthropic efforts , and
17,null,null,I had more friends and social obligations than I knew what to do with .
18,null,null,My senior year I spent the fall studying abroad in France .
19,null,null,It was magical .
20,null,null,I fell in love for the first time .
21,null,null,I was not reciprocated , but
22,null,null,the thing I learned about love is that it does not have to be reciprocated to be the most beautiful thing you have ever felt .
23,null,null,When I got back from France , the seeds of my current ruin were planted .
24,null,null,All throughout college I would been heavily involved with a camp for kids whose parents have cancer .
25,null,null,I did it because my dad had cancer when I was a little kid , and the people I met were all wonderful , but most of all because the only thing that gives me a sense of purpose is helping other people .
26,null,null,It drives almost everything I do .
27,null,null,This camp gave me a rock that I could cling to through the worst of my emotional storms .
28,null,null,The two directors of the camp were both new my senior year .
29,null,null,While I was in France , one of them dropped out of school due to her own struggles with mental health .
30,null,null,The director that was left over was completely overwhelmed , and entirely ineffectual .
31,null,null,People left and
32,null,null,right
33,null,null,were telling me that I should take the open position .
34,null,null,I did not want it ; I have ADHD as well as depression
35,null,null,and I was so anxious about my lack of organization .
36,null,null,Camp was in such a hole though , and
37,null,null,for the sake of my friends and my campers and their families
38,null,null,I did the only thing I felt like I could do , and .
39,null,null,took on the directorship
40,null,null,It was rough .
41,null,null,My co - director continued to do little of anything , and
42,null,null,I felt like I was juggling grenades .
43,null,null,I could not fuck this up .
44,null,null,Kids I would been mentoring for years needed this camp to cope in a healthy way , and
45,null,null,for a number of parent couples , the week of camp was the last time they got to spend alone together before one of them would pass away from cancer .
46,null,null,My grades dropped a whole point , on average .
47,null,null,My volunteer research suffered , and
48,null,null,I really let down the post
49,null,null,doc
50,null,null,I was assisting ( Sorry Bethany ) .
51,null,null,My mental health took a nosedive as well .
52,null,null,I made camp happen .
53,null,null,It was ugly and bumpy and unorganized , but
54,null,null,I made it happen .
55,null,null,I took solace in the fact that the kids did not seem to notice the flaws , but
56,null,null,it did not do a lot good for my relationships with the other volunteers .
57,null,null,I redoubled my efforts at the beginning of my 5th and final year of college .
58,null,null,I moved into a house with some of the other volunteers who I was closest to .
59,null,null,I had to quit my research , and
60,null,null,I could not keep my grades where I wanted them , but camp planning was progressing well , especially after our national organization took notice of the lack of effort on my co - director is part and added a third director , my friend and newly minted roommate A. A helped enormously , but I still had so much on my plate .
61,null,null,To cope with the stress , my drug use started to skyrocket .
62,null,null,I was smoking weed and cigarettes all the time , and
63,null,null,to keep up with all my biochemistry coursework and 8 - 10 planning meetings
64,null,null,a week I was taking my prescribed adderall more often than I should have been .
65,null,null,I became thoroughly addicted .
66,null,null,In my final quarter of school , everything really fell apart .
67,null,null,I was completely overwhelmed , and .
68,null,null,became less and less effective at my job
69,null,null,I put A in the exact position that I had been in the previous year .
70,null,null,I could feel him resent me more and more every day , but
71,null,null,I was too ashamed to talk to him about it , and he never asked me how I was doing .
72,null,null,I barely graduated .
73,null,null,As soon as school was over I quit adderall cold turkey , because it had been putting me in a very dangerous mental headspace for weeks , but until then it had remained a necessity .
74,null,null,The withdrawals hit me like a truck .
75,null,null,Getting out of bed felt like a truly herculean task .
76,null,null,I was an empty husk of a human being and from graduation to camp in August
77,null,null,I contributed almost nothing to the camp .
78,null,null,I had nothing left to give .
79,null,null,A hated me by that point .
80,null,null,He began to tell people what he thought of me , and
81,null,null,they listened .
82,null,null,I watched helplessly as some of my closest friends and roommates began to look down upon me , if not for what A was saying then for my severely depressed behavior .
83,null,null,I could not even really blame them .
84,null,null,After camp , when we had our traditional fun awards ceremony , A was awarded " Most likely to make camp happen by himself " .
85,null,null,I was awarded " Linger " , a camp song I was known for singing , but also a very pointed jab .
86,null,null,It was humiliating .
87,null,null,At the afterparty that night I drunkenly told A everything .
88,null,null,He said it was ok , and
89,null,null,I cried lying drunk on the porch .
90,null,null,I lived in the house with him for a few more months while I looked for a job .
91,null,null,A was incredibly distant , and .
92,null,null,became more and more hostile over time
93,null,null,I got a job on a crab boat .
94,null,null,I had a few reasons for doing it , but
95,null,null,the most important reason in my head was that I might be lucky enough for it to kill me .
96,null,null,The day I moved out A sent me a 6 paragraph essay over text , detailing everything I would ever done that had disappointed him , and letting me know that there was nothing I could ever do to win his respect back .
97,null,null,I left the state to work on the crab boat .
98,null,null,For 5 months I lived in isolation , either working or chain smoking weed to keep myself from ruminating on all my failures .
99,null,null,The crab boat did almost kill me .
100,null,null,Multiple times , in fact .
101,null,null,In the end I quit , not because I was suddenly afraid to die , but
102,null,null,because my captain was the most sadistic piece of human scum I would ever met , and I could not take him any more .
103,null,null,I have spent the 5 months since then trying to find a job .
104,null,null,50 +
105,null,null,apps out
106,null,null,and I am no closer than when I started .
107,null,null,I have been up to visit the city I graduated in twice , but
108,null,null,both times I have been wracked with crippling anxiety .
109,null,null,I can tell how A affected the opinions of some of my closest friends , and
110,null,null,it kills me .
111,null,null,So , that is where I am .
112,null,null,I am going to go smoke a cigarette and pray that I get my dad is cancer even younger than he did .

1,null,null,A song of fire and ice
2,null,null,Hey everyone .
3,null,null,I am on mobile .
4,null,null,so pardon my typos which will happen
5,null,null,I would like to take this time to thank anyone who reads this as well as giving a shout out to anyone currently struggling with depression .
6,null,null,I have a long history with Type 1 Bipolar Disorder .
7,null,null,Although that is not necessarily depression in itself patients who are Bipolar are bound to eventually oscillate into that emotional polarity .
8,null,null,To give a quick summary here is what happened to me : I grew up incredibly wealthy .
9,null,null,My Father was an ex alcoholic .
10,null,null,My Mother died when I was 13 and my Father went back to drinking to cope with the loss of his wife ( my Mother ) .
11,null,null,My Father became suicidal and .
12,null,null,threw everything we had away
13,null,null,We went bankrupt and
14,null,null,I went to live with my Brother across the country .
15,null,null,My Brothers wife left him shortly after I moved in .
16,null,null,He became suicidal as well , .
17,null,null,ended up hospitalized
18,null,null,I moved back across the country again to live with my then pseudo homeless Father .
19,null,null,One day my Father shows up to my school drunk , gets arrested , I am taken in by the state and .
20,null,null,put into foster care
21,null,null,I end up living with an incredibly poor hispanic family and eat almost nothing everyday .
22,null,null,I have no bed .
23,null,null,I sleep on the floor .
24,null,null,The state then places me in an incredibly religious home where i essentially become a slave
25,null,null,and i cook and .
26,null,null,clean nonstop for an extremely wealthy catholic couple
27,null,null,They do not like me Because I liked hard rock .
28,null,null,My third stay
29,null,null,I end up living in a small apartment with a woman who was good at hiding her side prostitution gig and methamphetamine addiction .
30,null,null,After all the years my Father gets his life back under control .
31,null,null,He begins dating a wealthy woman who is not a fan of me .
32,null,null,He takes prolonged stays at her home about 40 miles away .
33,null,null,He would visit the house to restock it with food , .
34,null,null,pay the bills , then leave again
35,null,null,During this time i saw my Father maybe 15 times a year .
36,null,null,Each encounter was brief and .
37,null,null,lasted less than 30 minutes
38,null,null,During this I still went to school , cooked , did my laundry , and did kind of normal kid stuff .
39,null,null,The point of this story is I am an adult now who is married .
40,null,null,I am a software engineer .
41,null,null,I am financially stable .
42,null,null,Regardless of how dark it gets it is possible to make it out on top .
43,null,null,You have to focus and be strong .
44,null,null,Do whatever you need to do to survive .
45,null,null,If anyone has any questions or would like to chat , need advice , whatever please let me know .
46,null,null,I currently do volunteer work to aid people who suffer from Bipolar Disorder as well as others like ADHD or OCD .
47,null,null,I also , accidentally , mentor Fatherless children on Xbox Live (
48,null,null,strange , I know ) .
49,null,null,Its not easy out there and world and parents sometimes forget how hard it is being a teen .
50,null,null,No judgement .
51,null,null,I hope everyone has a good night ( or day , depending where you are at ) .

1,null,null,Cold turkey of Escitalopram
2,null,null,So let me begin this by saying this is a terrible idea
3,null,null,and I should definitely taper off with the help of my psychiatrist .
4,null,null,So , earlier this year after some lack of focus and insistent lethargy eventually my parents decided to take me to a psychiatrist .
5,null,null,One thing leads to another
6,null,null,and I am diagnosed with depression and .
7,null,null,put on a dose of escitalopram ( generic form of Lexapro ) 20 mg a day
8,null,null,Have a history of depression on my mother is side , and they had all the symptoms pretty severely minus the suicidal ideation , which I believed supported their diagnosis .
9,null,null,So as school was finishing up and I had exams to study for , I spent most afternoons essentially consciously unconscious as I was too tired and struggling to keep a focus on homework and related tasks .
10,null,null,Long story short told my parents I had been taking Adderall once and a while
11,null,null,and we talked to the psychiatrist
12,null,null,and he was very understanding and after trying to allow the SSRI to do its magic , he ultimately added an Adderall script to my regime .
13,null,null,So for some months I took the addy as needed and the anti - depressant as described ( other than the days I forgot ) .
14,null,null,So fast forward to summer and
15,null,null,while I am feeling marginally better , I was lead to believe the addy was doing most of the work .
16,null,null,So just last week I decided just to cold turkey
17,null,null,the SSRI .
18,null,null,Now , this was a slight test of seeing how I would react to abstaining from the meds ( which is an awful idea ) .
19,null,null,Strangely , I have noticed no real change whatsoever from when I was taking it to this past week of not taking it at all .
20,null,null,I am somewhat familiar with the omens regarding stopping an anti - depressant cold turkey and the associated rebound depression and serotonin - related issues , however , I am unsure why I have not experienced anything .
21,null,null,The optimistic side of me wants to explain this as my body just being weird and being able to withstand this drug - related anomaly .
22,null,null,The pessimistic side of me believes that it is related to escitalopram somewhat length half - life and that a nightmarish hell awaits me very soon .
23,null,null,Just as a side note , at the same time as my depression diagnosis , I also got a blood test which delivered wonderful news that I had Lyme is Disease ( which after much reading , I found exhibits many traits of depression and ADHD like disorders ) and was promptly treated .
24,null,null,Now I do not proclaim to be healed as I still exhibit a sense of lethargy , however , that might just be something I have become accustomed to and given getting out of my house , I am usually able to go out and be alive .
25,null,null,Obviously , not discussing this decision with my doctor is unnecessarily dangerous and naive , but
26,null,null,I just do not enjoy taking the medication and this past week kind of supports my idea that I do not really need to take the medication if I am able to function fine without it .
27,null,null,Forgive me for this whole backstory of my last year , I just was unsure if some of this information might be useful in determining what is happening .
28,null,null,*
29,null,null,* tlr
30,null,null,*
31,null,null,* : got lethargic and lacked focus this last year , diagnosed with depression and Lyme is disease
32,null,null,, been on escitalopram since spring and Adderall
33,null,null,( whenever I choose to take it ) since mid - Mayish .
34,null,null,Have stopped taking escitalopram for about a week now and .
35,null,null,am not exhibiting any withdrawals or issues regarding the cold turkey
36,null,null,My question is : am I an anomaly or am I due for a bitter time in the near future ?
37,null,null,QUICK EDIT :

39,null,null,all I can seem to find is the side - effects of not taking the medication , so if someone has some website or anecdotal experience they can refer me to , that would be much appreciated

1369 13
 (0, 0),
1,null,null,Hi , everyone - new to these forum board thingies
2,null,null,so please forgive me if this does not end up being posted in the right place !
3,null,null,I have lived with depression since I was 14 years old
4,null,null,( I am now 43 ) .
5,null,null,For the past 10 years I have been managing this condition without the aid of drugs or stimulants .
6,null,null,My life changed the day I stopped fighting the " condition " and accepted it as part of who I was .
7,null,null,Acceptance is the greatest gift you can give yourself on the road to recovery , not only does it take away the stigma , it also gives the fear nothing to feed on .
8,null,null,For those of you who are still in the depths of darkness , please do not give up hope , there are many of us out here who , have experienced exactly what you are going through now
9,null,null,, we survived
10,null,null,- so can you .
11,null,null,Recovery is possible , it just takes time and a little faith in yourself .
12,null,null,Thank you for allowing me to join this community , I hope my experiences of living with this condition can help others , the door to the email box is always open !
13,null,null,Kindest regards to all

1,null,null,A Letter to My Future Self : Self Love Dear ( future ) B , This letter may be fragmented .
2,null,null,This letter may be short , or
3,null,null,it may be long .
4,null,null,This letter may be emotional .
5,null,null,Most importantly , this letter is to show you that you can stay grounded despite the rush of emotions you experience when you feel vulnerable and [ falsely ] unloved .
6,null,null,Everything you thought you knew since that day ( October 21st ) has become unraveled within the last fourteen hours .
7,null,null,It is hard to find the words that can sum it all up in order to save some time and space within this letter .
8,null,null,This letter is also not about those specific events but about you and only you , and how far you have come ; it all plays into being able to deal with whatever the future may bring .
9,null,null,As you admitted this morning , to yourself and G , your sense of clarity evaporates when you begin to feel vulnerable .
10,null,null,It leads you to a self - fulfilling prophecy - .
11,null,null,the exact neediness you exhibit will do the exact opposite of you would like what it to do and will therefore lead you to feeling ever more needy
12,null,null,Listen to me :
13,null,null,You are not validated by someone .
14,null,null,is ability ( or lack thereof ) to love you
15,null,null,And again : Sometimes , it is not simply not about you .
16,null,null,So far in your healing process you have managed to understand the importance of detachment .
17,null,null,You are making wonderful progress and
18,null,null,I hope that at some point you are still progressing .
19,null,null,Your existence is for you and for you only .
20,null,null,It is not okay or healthy to live solely for another human being .
21,null,null,Remember that you are not incomplete without someone however that someone can enhance the you that you already are .
22,null,null,A relationship consists of two people working together as a whole yet existing as their own sense of wholeness outside of the relationship .
23,null,null,That is so very important for you to remember for the rest of your life .
24,null,null,Remember when you felt vulnerable just a few weeks ago ( sometime in November ) and wanted to dive into texting that boy in order to make you feel better about yourself ?
25,null,null,And then remember that you did not because you kept your clarity and understood that it was a coping mechanism .
26,null,null,Do not forget that you have done that not only once but a few times now and that is exceptional .
27,null,null,I understand future Bri may encounter some setbacks and that her well - being might as well be a roulette wheel , but
28,null,null,that is exactly what this letter is for .
29,null,null,As you have been told , you are luminous .
30,null,null,You shine bright .
31,null,null,Your heart is [ almost too ] huge .
32,null,null,You have the potential to do great things .
33,null,null,You are not your illness and
34,null,null,you are not your insecurities .
35,null,null,The grave you will lay in one day will only consist of you and nobody else .
36,null,null,If the world ends and you survive , you have yourself .
37,null,null,You have to keep this mind every single day .
38,null,null,Work on self love and .
39,null,null,understand your worth
40,null,null,Yes , G makes you feel like the most important girl in the world .
41,null,null,But before you can let him do that , you need to understand that you are the most important girl in the world to yourself , for yourself .
42,null,null,You are done putting your interests aside just to receive love for the night / day .
43,null,null,You are done with getting angry at the phone for not getting responses quickly .
44,null,null,You are done feeling unimportant or unloved because you are not someone is first priority .
45,null,null,In the month and a half since the breakup , you have transformed .
46,null,null,It is only the beginning
47,null,null,but you have taken steps in the right direction .
48,null,null,Future B needs to look back on this whether she is in a good spot at the time or not .
49,null,null,She needs to know that even though she may not be at a point in life she envisioned , she did something for herself .
50,null,null,When you feel like he is pulling away , do not push harder .
51,null,null,When you feel like you want to run to him in order to silence your overwhelmingly surfacing insecurities , understand that will not make things better .
52,null,null,Understand that they are amplified and you are only expressing coping mechanisms in order to deal with the underlying issue .
53,null,null,The issue is not that he does not love you but that you make yourself unloveable .
54,null,null,Understand that when you get into that mindset and lose grasp of the clarity , someone moving mountains for you will not fill that hole of pain .
55,null,null,The only person on the face of this Earth that can fill that hole is you .
56,null,null,You have the capability of moving mountains on your own when you remember these things .
57,null,null,Continue doing your research .
58,null,null,Continue taking time for yourself .
59,null,null,Continue setting your phone down for hours at a time .
60,null,null,Continue living your life out and letting others play a part and not the center role .
61,null,null,You are the star of your life , you lead the show .
62,null,null,Your family , friends , boyfriend , colleagues - they play their roles in your story .
63,null,null,Most importantly , they play their lead role in their own stories and
64,null,null,similarly you are character .
65,null,null,Learn to appreciate silence .
66,null,null,Learn to appreciate a bit of loneliness and solitude .
67,null,null,Self - love includes coming home from work to take a hot bath and drink a glass of red wine , not rushing over to whoevers house in order to feel loved by someone else .
68,null,null,You can not be loved appropriately if you can not love yourself first .
69,null,null,Is not it just like me to start taking the advice I have been given by so many people my entire life .
70,null,null,Love yourself .
71,null,null,Respect yourself .
72,null,null,Appreciate your own time .
73,null,null,Respect others .
74,null,null,Respect other is need for space .
75,null,null,Live for you .
76,null,null,Again , love yourself .
77,null,null,With love , B , 12/3/2017 .

1,null,null,I kinda like being depressed after dealing with anxiety
2,null,null,As a lot of people , I have both depression and anxiety disorders .
3,null,null,Basically a thing happened in July , which caused me to have constant panic attacks and overall brutal anxiety until around October , when I just transitioned into deep depression .

5,null,null,I was completely empty
6,null,null,, I did not care about anything .
7,null,null,It was 100x better to me than fucking anxiety .

9,null,null,I do not feel good either , but
10,null,null,I am fine with that .
11,null,null,I do not feel anything .
12,null,null,, it is kinda relaxing

14,null,null,I was really close to killing myself and
15,null,null,I also threatened to shoot up the school , after which police took me to a mental hospital .

17,null,null,I did some really bad things
18,null,null,, I acted really bad , but
19,null,null,on the inside I felt better .

21,null,null,just want help

23,null,null,I just wanted to add my experience , since it is different to everyone else is .

25,null,null,, I sweat , I shake , it feels literally like torture .
26,null,null,Depression is the exact opposite .
27,null,null,It is calmness , not giving a shit about anything , basically relaxing .

1404 48
 (0, 0),
1,null,null,Hello , I am Yevgenny , 21 years old , and
2,null,null,have suffered from depression for ..
3,null,null,well .. I guess as long as I can remember .
4,null,null,I started having suicidal thoughts when I was 9 , but
5,null,null,strangely enough , I can not remember having at that age any concept of suicide .
6,null,null,I have been placed on practically all of the antidepressants over the years ( with the exception of MAOIs ) , and
7,null,null,am currently taking Cymbalta -- no real side effects
8,null,null,, seems effective enough .
9,null,null,My father died when I was 18 , but
10,null,null,that in itself was not so sad .
11,null,null,Last September , I had a sudden thought regarding my feelings about his death , and
12,null,null,I found the most heartbreaking aspect was , like I said , not the fact that he died , but that the process of dying was for him degrading and humiliating .
13,null,null,Like me , he was very independent -- if he needed help with something , he considered himself defeated ; he was content in his own world , like I am , but the magnitude of something like death forced people into his world ..
14,null,null,those intangible connections between ourselves and others , between him and others , seemed to chain him down .
15,null,null,When I had my last breakdown in September , I could not stop myself from imagining it ; to find yourself suddenly and wholly dependent on others , and for them to force themselves into your mind , your world , and find for themselves some memory or happy relic to take with them such that even your most private , perhaps sacred thoughts and memories are wrenched from you .
16,null,null,I thought about what it must have been like to know with certainty that death was all that was left , the helplessness of not being able to face your own future without someone either doing it for you or having earlier robbed you of the existential will power to do it .
17,null,null,I attempted to hang myself after my morning classes .
18,null,null,I am not sure how , but
19,null,null,before kicking the chair away , I forced myself to call someone because the world is so huge , and I have only had the chance to see such a small part of it , to die then , would have been so meaningless and empty --
20,null,null,the very things I was attempting to escape , meaninglessness and emptiness .
21,null,null,The friend I called left work immediately and .
22,null,null,came to me
23,null,null,She cried in one afternoon more than I ever have , and
24,null,null,she was not even the depressed one .
25,null,null,So , fast forward to today .
26,null,null,Did some inpatient care .
27,null,null,I am seeing a therapist whom I trust , respect , and have thus far been unable to outwit
28,null,null,( it is a good thing . )
29,null,null,On a physiological basis , the medication is helping .
30,null,null,Psychologically however , I have got some work to do .
31,null,null,Ignoring biological / chemical factors , in order for me to be happy , I need to find / build / understand the meaning of my life .
32,null,null,I do not believe that man is born with an inherent raison d'etre , or that one is given to him by some divine entity ; rather , I believe that the meaning of one is life is self - constructed and in continual flux , it is something you work on , something you subsist upon , and .
33,null,null,yet is something that is always just out of reach , or one brush stroke undone
34,null,null,Not an easy job .
35,null,null,But last week I was on my front porch at around 4 pm having a cigarette ( I am keeping this habit for now . )
36,null,null,Everything was still , the air still cold with winter but with traces of spring on every tree , the clouds were lit from below and the west , it was like a painting ; but
37,null,null,it was this oddly static scene that gave me the most lucid understanding of myself , that unstoppable , dynamic thing we call self .
38,null,null,And so , more than ever before , I am going to take treatment seriously and honestly ; even if there is sadness , those chance moments of serenity that make up for in intensity what they lack in length , in those instances I think I will find meaning ,
39,null,null,no , I already have , I suppose .
40,null,null,I apologize for how lengthy this became , but
41,null,null,I am guessing it was somehow necessary for me to say .
42,null,null,I am looking forward to talking with the other members of the forum , as I do not think I have ever talked to others who were depressed .
43,null,null,Even if I do not find much help here , there might be someone who finds such help in me .
44,null,null,Thanks !
45,null,null,And , again , I will try to keep future posts shorter , but
46,null,null,in my defense , sometimes when I write I do not feel in control ..
47,null,null,oh , starting to go off again .
48,null,null,Ok , I am going to stop now .

1411 28
 (0, 0),
1,null,null,Hi !
2,null,null,We are YourAmigo Hi !
3,null,null,I am A.M.
4,null,null,and I am writing to introduce a new initiative named YourAmigo .
5,null,null,Basically we are a group of friends that have to decided to form this initiative to help anyone who need an amigo ( Spanish word for friend ) .
6,null,null,We work by assigning anyone who wants it , an amigo with whom you can talk about anything .
7,null,null,We do not accept donations , though if anyone wants to help us or has any suggestions , feel free to contact us .
8,null,null,Let me explain who we are We are not therapists , and
9,null,null,we realize that we are not capable of solving your problems , or even comprehend your pain ; but we can listen to you .
10,null,null,We want to hear your stories , we want you to tell us whatever you would like to say .
11,null,null,In the end we just want you to feel heard .
12,null,null,And of course , you will never be judged .
13,null,null,You know guys , we have all been there , in that cold and lonely place .
14,null,null,For some , this place will be terrifying and , for others it might be something less severe .
15,null,null,called depression
16,null,null,But we do not care .
17,null,null,If it is important enough for you to feel bad about it , then it would be an honor for us to hear about it .
18,null,null,Here is how we work : below you have the email address where you can find us .
19,null,null,Please write us .
20,null,null,In your first email , you can tell us anything you want , though a little bit of your story is always welcomed ( though not required ! ) .
21,null,null,And that is it !
22,null,null,Here is our email address : youramigoam.com
23,null,null,And that is it !
24,null,null,Last but not least , I want to thank you for reading this far .
25,null,null,I really encourage you to text us .
26,null,null,Moreover feel free to copy and paste this message in any other forum : the more people that read this , the more people we can help !
27,null,null,See you soon !
28,null,null,A.M.

3,null,null,sometimes it is more manageable than other times .
4,null,null,I have noticed that with every new year and myself getting older , I begin to look back on my past and long for it , even sometimes breaking down because I miss the person I used to be .
5,null,null,I am 23 , so still young , but
6,null,null,I really wish I could go back and be 19/20 again because that was when I was truly happy .
7,null,null,I had moved out of my hometown , had lots of friends , a good relationship , I lost tons of weight and was confident for the first time ever , I traveled and .
8,null,null,worked for fun instead of working as a means of survival
